programme.desc: Tiga sahabat ini pada asalnya berkiblatkan pada kebenaran dan kesucian, tetapi atas cabaran suratan nasib, mereka berubah mengambil jalan singkat untuk mengubah hidup mereka . Mereka bertiga melakukan satu rompakan nekad untuk membantu nenek salleh yang terlantar di hospital, yang memerlukan wang yang banyak untuk mendapatkan rawatan pakar

programme.title: Suamiku Sudah Menikahiku Tapi Masih Mencintai Mantannya
programme.desc: Kania harus menerima hakikat bahawa Reno masih belum dapat melupakan Sarah sepenuhnya. Malah, perjalanan rumah tangganya baru saja dimulai.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep147
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: D'Star Ep87
programme.desc: D'Star ialah pertandingan nyanyian berprestij di mana 30 penyanyi bersaing untuk menjadi All-Stars'. Penyanyi ini adalah dari D'Academy, Selebriti D'Academy, Liga Dangdut Indonesia, dan Bintang Pantura. Mereka akan mempersembahkan pelbagai genre muzik dan menunjukkan kemahiran mereka.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep28
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep108
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep148
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Bocah Pemanjat Pohon Kelapa Yang Berjuang Menghidupi Keluarganya
programme.desc: Satu insiden kemalangan kerja menimpa Darma, mengakibatkan dia terpaksa berhenti dari pekerjaannya. Alif sebagai anak, merasa kasihan melihat ayahnya. Dengan inisiatif Alif, dia menggantikan Darma untuk bekerja sebagai pemanjat pokok kelapa.

programme.title: Suster El Ep28
programme.desc: Kisah seorang gadis yatim piatu bernama Elnara yang tinggal bersama kakaknya, Resti. Demi memenuhi impian Nara untuk menjadi jururawat, Resti bekerja keras. Hingga suatu hari, Resti bertemu dengan seorang lelaki kaya bernama Verdi dan mereka akhirnya menikah. Nara sangat gembira kerana perkahwinan Resti membawa kehidupan yang lebih baik untuk mereka, tetapi kegembiraan Nara berakhir seketika apabila dia menemui sesuatu yang menggoncangkan dunianya dan mengancam untuk memisahkan keluarganya.

programme.title: Awas Tercyduk Ep6
programme.desc: Awas Tercyduk, sebuah program realiti televisyen, mendedahkan kejadian yang tidak dijangka dalam kehidupan seharian kita.

programme.title: Golden Memories Asia Ep42
programme.desc: Golden Memories Asia merupakan acara pencarian bakat untuk menyanyikan lagu-lagu nostalgia atau lagu lama dari tahun 1970-an hingga 2000-an, dihadiri oleh enam negara Asia Tenggara iaitu Brunei Darussalam, Indonesia, Malaysia, Filipina, Singapura, dan Timor Leste. Program ini adalah untuk memupuk kegembiraan dan keseronokan, serta satu bentuk persahabatan antara negara.

programme.title: Cinta Abang Es Krim Ada Manis Manisnya

programme.title: Bongkar Cinta Pesulap Ganteng
programme.desc: Bimsalabim, apa yang terjadi? Eh, rupanya semasa sedang bersilap mata, Didin salah menyebut mantra dan Luna muncul sebagai jodohnya

programme.title: Suster El Ep30

programme.title: Jalan-Jalan Sultan Ep4
programme.desc: Pengacara-pengacara meneroka beberapa destinasi pelancongan terbaik di Indonesia, dan bertanya soalan kepada beberapa pengunjung. Mereka yang menjawab dengan betul akan menerima hadiah.

programme.title: Tukul Arwana One Man Show Ep21
programme.desc: Sebuah program bual bicara yang dihoskan Tukul Arwana di Indosiar menyajikan hiburan terbaru yang akan menemani penonton semasa pandemik COVID-19 bersama bintang jemputan, tokoh masyarakat dan mereka yang tular di media sosial.

programme.title: Samjin Company English Class
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in South Korea, three female office co-workers who enroll in English classes in hopes to advance their careers, struggle to expose the corruption inside their company.

programme.title: Love+Sling
programme.desc: Despite having zero interest in the sport, Sung-woong trains to become a top wrestler with his dad's enthusiastic support. When the girl he likes falls for his dad, they begin wrestling for love.

programme.title: Wonderful Ghost
programme.desc: A patrol officer’s soul gets separated from his body while he was investigating a case. Unexpectedly he discovers his neighbor who runs a judo studio is the only person can see him.

programme.title: Boomerang Family
programme.desc: A peaceful household is disturbed by the return of a woman’s three grown children one after the other.

programme.title: Decision To Leave
programme.desc: When detective Hae-Joon investigates the death of a man who fell from a mountaintop and meets his wife Seo-rae, he starts to suspect her at the same time that he begins feeling an attraction to her.

programme.title: Howling
programme.desc: A detective and his rookie partner probe a murder in which the victim appears to have unusual bite marks.

programme.title: Okay! Madam
programme.desc: A married couple unwittingly become involved in a rescue operation of a hijacked aircraft during their first-ever family trip abroad to Hawaii.

programme.title: Kingmaker
programme.desc: A politician met a talented campaign strategist who helped him in becoming the strongest presidential election candidate. Yet conflicts deepen as the he disagrees with the latter on his ideologies.

programme.title: Cassiopeia
programme.desc: Soo-Jin is a successful lawyer and loving mother who tries to live a fulfilling life after her divorce, but things start to fall apart when she is diagnosed with Alzheimer's after a car accident.

programme.title: The Outlaws
programme.desc: In order to maintain peace, a ruthless detective and his ragtag team plan to take down the most feared Chinese gangster in Seoul.

programme.title: Juror 8
programme.desc: Based on a true story, eight ordinary people of different backgrounds were selected as the first jury for a murder trial in South Korea in 2008.

programme.title: How To Steal A Dog
programme.desc: As the family goes bankrupt, Jiso decided to steal dog from wealthy family and return it for the reward money. Will her plan be successful?

programme.title: Memories Of Murder
programme.desc: Based on a true story, the film follows the path of three detectives as they investigate the grisly rapes and ritualistic killings of local women in small-town of South Korea in 1986.

programme.title: The Age Of Blood
programme.desc: The once best swordsman in Joseon, Kim Ho, was demoted as a prison guard after a lost battle and fought with a rebel force that snuck into the jail to save their captured leader.

programme.title: 6/45: Lucky Lotto
programme.desc: The excitement of winning a lottery ticket doesn’t last long for sergeant Chun-woo as it accidentally ends up crossing the Military Demarcation Line. He must get his act together and find it again!

programme.title: The Royal Tailor
programme.desc: A rivalry between two tailors at the Sanguiwon, the department where the attire worn by royalty were made during the Joseon era, plunges the court into scandal and tragedy.

programme.title: Fabricated City
programme.desc: When an online gamer is framed for a murder, a hacker tries to uncover the truth behind the murder case and help clear his name.

programme.title: Me And Me
programme.desc: When a detective heads to a rural village to investigate the mysterious death of a couple, he finds himself in an inexplicable situation where his life is completely reversed.

programme.title: The Exclusive: Beat The Devil'S Tattoo
programme.desc: When a journalist discovers that his exclusive story on a serial killer was based on false information, he fabricates more lies to cover his mistake.

programme.title: Eungyo
programme.desc: Renowned old poet Jeokyo 's relationship with his son-like student Jiwoo starts to crack when a 17-year-old girl Eungyo steps in.

programme.title: Peninsula
programme.desc: Set four years after the zombie outbreak, a former soldier and his team return to the zombie-infested wastelands to retrieve a truck of money and try to escape from it alive.

programme.title: Boomerang Family
programme.desc: A peaceful household is disturbed by the return of a woman’s three grown children one after the other.

programme.title: My Girlfriend Is An Agent
programme.desc: A secret agent couple goes behind each other’s backs, unknowingly on the same mission to stop a Russian organized crime ring from stealing an advanced bio-chemical weapon.

programme.title: Baseball Girl
programme.desc: A young girl is graduating from high school and determined to become the first female player to join a professional baseball in Korea.

programme.title: Underground Rendezvous
programme.desc: A series of disasters in the big city bring an aspiring teacher to a small town where he falls in love with a girl whose origins are mysterious.

programme.title: Decision To Leave
programme.desc: When detective Hae-Joon investigates the death of a man who fell from a mountaintop and meets his wife Seo-rae, he starts to suspect her at the same time that he begins feeling an attraction to her.

programme.title: Hindsight
programme.desc: A hitwoman is hired to keep a close eye on the retired mob boss, but things get complicated when they grow attached to each other at a cooking class…

programme.title: Chinese Story Ep29
programme.desc: "Chinese story" is a 30-minute feature program to promote overseas Chinese. The program records the struggles of outstanding overseas Chinese and tells their wonderful life stories.

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep6566
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46604661
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2061
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3640
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2062
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa(T) Ep163
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: 2023 Tainan Summer Music Festival(M) Ep1
programme.desc: The 2023 Tainan Summer Music Festival will sing enthusiastically and the firework show will continue for two days, giving you both auditory and visual enjoyment on a hot summer!

programme.title: Way to Health(M) Ep225226
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about one’s health.

programme.title: The Wonder Woman(M) Ep2021
programme.desc: Be a "shark", if you're a woman, to survive in your working and personal relationship? DU,AI-SHA, also known as Shark, is aggressive and ruthless YI,FEI-YANG nickname is "Orca". Orcas kills sharks. That implies the relationship between them. They are friends and foes at the same time. They show no mercy and never surrender. Love comes and goes but friendship lasts forever. AI-SHA doesn't want to lose her best friend YI,FEI-YANG. She doesn't need love, but she needs him.

programme.title: Where The Wind Blows
programme.desc: Founded in the 70s, Hong Kong’s ICAC is committed to fight corruption in the police force. Detectives Lui Lok and Nam Kong build a corruption system that creates conflicts between the triad and the police. When ICAC hunts down the two, their control finally comes to an end. Where the wind blows, Hong Kong is no longer what it used to be!

programme.title: God of Gamblers 2
programme.desc: A new chapter of the highly successful "God of Gamblers". The legend's disciple Andy Lau is now rising in the gambling world as the "Knight of Gamblers"; clashing with another gambling icon, the wild psychic Stephen Chow (aka "Saint of Gamblers") who wants to follow the God. They mix like oil and water in a series of tricks and mishaps, but are forced to join hands against their master's nemesis on the gambling table.

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The “passion choir pilot program” trains students from three underperforming schools’ choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the “passion choir” and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: Flirting Scholar from the Future
programme.desc: Tiger, Lambert and Skinny Pig are massive fans of the movie, Flirting Scholar. One day, Skinny Pig who is an obscure inventor, puts together a “movie time machine” and accidentally sucks all of them into the movie of Flirting Scholar. The trio head off to Wah mansion to meet the maid Autumn – can they find her and can they return to the present?

programme.title: A Wedding Invitation
programme.desc: A boy’s marriage proposal was rejected by the girl and the lovers separated. Nonetheless, they agree on a break-up contract stating that if both are single in five years they will get married. Can they finally be together?

programme.title: Murderer
programme.desc: A police officer Tai is found seriously hurt while another officer Ling is found lying in a coma at the crime scene. Ling awakens with a memory loss and cannot explain why he was at the scene. As a result, he is accused of attempted murder. While Ling feels aggrieved, he also finds all evidences pointing to him as the murderer...

programme.title: A House of Happiness
programme.desc: Uncle Shui suffers from Alzheimer's disease but still remembers his son and late wife. His caregiver Ha Gu leaves him as she cannot stand his bad temper. He then falls in love with a woman who looks like his late wife but has a hidden agenda. His neighbours try to seek help from Ha Gu and Shui’s son to make Shui see the truth about the newcomer.

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: Kung Fu Fighter
programme.desc: Ma goes in search of his father in Shanghai. Inheriting his father’s physical strength, Ma gets hired by a boxing club and befriends Fatty. As a result of Fatty using fake notes to bet at the triad’s boxing club, both of them are hunted down by the gangsters. Luckily they are saved by some martial arts masters but the fight has only just begun.

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: A talented rogue trader experiences a 180-degree change in life when he encounters a girl who does not believe good things will happen to her. Will they fall in love? It seems like a Cinderella’s adventure has just begun!

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the country’s energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kong’s Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: Detective Dee and Nine-storey Demon Building
programme.desc: A series of strange incidents happen at the Tang’s demon building but Detective Dee finds no clue. Dee finds the master of the family suspicious when he speaks with him, and when the eldest daughter Miss Tang secretly informs Dee about Mr Tang’s strange behavior and the fact that she is kept under surveillance, Dee vows to unveil the truth.

programme.title: Echoes of the Rainbow
programme.desc: Set in Hong Kong in the 1960s, the story revolves around the family of a hardworking shoemaker Mr Law, with his happy-go-lucky wife and two sons – a talented elder son and an eight-year-old eccentric younger son. While their lives are not always smooth-sailing, the family sticks together and support one another through thick and thin.

programme.title: Dragon Master: Dragon Spell
programme.desc: The Dragon King is locked in a seal by the Dragon Master for 500 years, and his daughter must travel back in time to 500 years ago to kill the Dragon Master, in order to reverse the act. Little did she know that the Dragon King and Dragon Master were close friends back then…

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Daily’s Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: Lost Love
programme.desc: Mei tries to get over the death of her young son by becoming a foster parent. For 13 years, Mei’s dedication to the foster child leads her to neglect her husband and the true needs of the child. It is only through the child’s unintentional help that the couple finally manages to salvage their relationship.

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: Bleeding Steel
programme.desc: A Hong Kong police inspector, Lin Dong, had to protect an important witness in his mission thirteen years ago. This not only forced him to be separated from his daughter, but also got him involved in a conspiracy spanning more than a decade.

programme.title: Only Cloud Knows
programme.desc: This romantic drama is based on the story of a real-life couple. It follows a grieving husband as he journeys to places of significance to his beloved dead wife across their New Zealand homeland.

programme.title: Europe Raiders
programme.desc: Mr Lin and Miss Wang are the two top bounty hunters in the business, and are searching for the destructive missile “Hand of God” to prove who is the better bounty hunter. They soon realize they are not the only ones after the missile. Will Lin and Wang put their differences aside and work together in search for the ‘Hand of God’?

programme.title: Aberdeen
programme.desc: The Cheng family embodies a microcosm of Hong Kong, with its contradictions between tradition and modernity, superstition and materialism, family and individual. The movie reveals troubled characters dealing with their own issues in the city, from the eldest, Taoist priest patriarch Dong; to the youngest, the bullied elementary schooler Chloe.

programme.title: She's a Man. He's a Woman.
programme.desc: This is a romantic comedy about a quarrelsome and loving couple whose spirits are being swapped over after a thunderstorm. The sexy lady finds herself carrying an ugly man’s spirit, and vice versa. Can they switch their spirits back, or do they need to get use to the situation for the rest of their lives?

programme.title: Horseplay
programme.desc: Ha Mui goes to London to track down an art thief, Nine-Tailed Fox, who is interested in a pottery horse from the Tang Dynasty. Cheung Ho is a cop who chases after Nine-Tailed Fox since he escaped years ago. The trio must work together to gain the pottery, with Nine-Tailed Fox being hunted by his rivals at the same time.

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: A school bus accident kills almost everyone on board. The bus driver got injured and partially lost his memory while rescuing one of the boys. To thank the driver, the boy’s dad, Wang, brings him to live with the family in their basement. However, the driver soon discovers strange behaviours from the Wang’s which seem to be related to the accident.

programme.title: Sound of Colors
programme.desc: Lonesome marriage consultant Ming meets a blind but charming young lady, Yeuk, at a subway station. When Ming suddenly turns blind too, Yeuk helps him navigate through his world of darkness, and they begin to fall in love. This feature is based on the illustrated book from famous Taiwan illustrator Jimmy Liao.

programme.title: Young and Dangerous: Reloaded
programme.desc: In this remake of “Young and Dangerous”, Chan Ho Nam and his three buddies of the Hung Hing triad gang strive to fight for their own justice, further expanding their power in the triad and becoming a new legend...

programme.title: 3Ft Ball and Souls
programme.desc: Members of an internet suicide room called Life Club decide to end their lives using explosives. But every time the fireworks explode, they find themselves back-in-time before they carried out their plan. They suspect the cause of this mystery to be the young age of one of the members and tries to convince the high school girl to quit…

programme.title: iGirl
programme.desc: Ekin Cheng and Chrissie Chau reunite in this romantic-comedy about three heartbroken men who each purchase an iGirl, the latest smart-robot, as their new girlfriends.

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: In this dark-comedy, cop-turned-security guard Ma faces the ultimate challenge when his boss mysteriously disappears and his paralyzed sister makes a morbid deal with the armed bandits who abduct her.

programme.title: Where The Wind Blows
programme.desc: Founded in the 70s, Hong Kong’s ICAC is committed to fight corruption in the police force. Detectives Lui Lok and Nam Kong build a corruption system that creates conflicts between the triad and the police. When ICAC hunts down the two, their control finally comes to an end. Where the wind blows, Hong Kong is no longer what it used to be!

programme.title: That Fiery Girl
programme.desc: The bandits of Hulu Valley slay the chief of the Mei Clan while searching for a treasure map. In retaliation, Chun from the Mei Clan infiltrates the bandit's fortress to map a way in for the authorities, but ends up falling in love with the bandit leader's daughter, Pearl. While Chun’s plot is uncovered, he receives unexpected help from Pearl.

programme.title: Human Lanterns
programme.desc: Zhao was once defeated by Long in a duel. 7 years later, however, Long asks Zhao to make a unique lantern on his behalf for winning the lantern contest. At the same time, Zhao plans for revenge. One day, after Long’s wife suddenly disappeared, Long hears about the story of human lantern, leading him to suspect Zhao may involve in the incident…

programme.title: The Kung-Fu Instructor
programme.desc: Wong Yang is a famous martial artist who is forced to teach kung fu to the Mong Clan, an evil clan which is trying to destroy its nemesis, the Chow Clan. Chow Ping from the Chow Clan is a student of Wong’s caught in the Mong’s territory and as punishment, the Mong Clan wants to cut off Chow Ping’s limbs. Wong steps in to defend his student.

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu takes on the glitzy world of nightclub performers in The Yellow Muffler. The film depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching-ping (Irene Chen I-ling) and Pai-hung (Betty Ting Pei) and ends when they are cast in a new movie.

programme.title: The Twelve Gold Medallions
programme.desc: This was one of top three films of 1970 and winner of "Outstanding Drama" at the 9th Golden Horse Awards. The evil minister uses twelve golden medallions to summon war hero Yueh Fei back from the frontline and execute him. A group of wandering warriors, led by Yueh Hua and Chin Ping, try to stop the medallion couriers.

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: Five Shaolin Masters
programme.desc: The Qing court plots to kill all Shaolin disciples by burning down Shaolin Temple. This sudden fire killed almost everyone except for five disciples. To take revenge on the Qing court, the five of them train hard in different fighting styles to become “The Five Shaolin Masters”.

programme.title: The Voyage Of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung continues his incognito voyage to southern China. Accompanied by the minister and the imperial scholar, they have many amusing encounters in Yangzhou.

programme.title: Heaven Sword And Dragon Sabre 2
programme.desc: Only by bringing together the powerful Heaven Sword and the mighty Dragon Sabre can six martial arts sects struggling for supremacy be saved in this thrilling sequel to Chu Yuan's original hit.

programme.title: River Of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husband’s death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: Return Of The Dead
programme.desc: A long-awaited horror sequel after Enchanted Shadow, this is about three asylum inmates telling their stories. In story one, a husband and wife discover they should be careful what they wish for. A naked female ghost seeks revenge from her watery grave in story two, and a dead prostitute returns as a ghost in the last tale.

programme.title: Vengeance Is A Golden Blade
programme.desc: Convoy Master Li’s wife has an affair with his rival Long, who plans to steal Li’s Golden Blade and kill him as well as his young daughter. Li and his daughter manage to escape and the latter grows up to be a skilled swordswoman who vows to avenge her mother’s death – a lie told by Li. The truth is revealed when she sees her mother alive by chance.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxing
programme.desc: Chan and his apprentice Fan transport vampires for a living. In their most recent job, they are hired to transport nine zombies at one go. When two of them hopped away, it is revealed that one of them is actually a man in disguise trying to escape from his enemies. It turns out that the fake zombie and Chan are both martial arts experts!

programme.title: The Enchantress
programme.desc: Shot on the Shaws' lot in the final years of Hong Kong's greatest studio, The Enchantress tells the story of martial artists who disappear in the night! Intrigued, wanna-be detective/swordsman Feng Chi-wu (Mok Siu-chung) is determined to find out what is happening. But when Feng finds out that an evil vampire spirit (Wei Chiu-hua) is killing swordsmen, he's in for more than he bargains for... It's an outlandish fairy-tale and martial arts fantasy, where your fists and sword aren't nearly enough!

programme.title: The Lark
programme.desc: Sixties pop star Carrie Ku plays the "Little Lark" in this romantic-drama of mistaken identity that is a treasure trove of some of the most popular Mandarin songs of all time.

programme.title: Super Inframan
programme.desc: Transformed from a young laboratory researcher, the thunderbolt-fisted Inframan must battle Princess Dragon Mom who wakes up from hibernation to conquer the earth with her army of mutant monsters.

programme.title: Fangs Of The Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the film's hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: Call To Arms
programme.desc: The aggressive and dangerous Chin Empire conquers the hard-put Chao kingdom while the Wei empire is drained of its heroes and paralyzed by an indecisive ruler. Adventure, intrigue, death and tragedy reigns before the triumphant clash of the armies.

programme.title: The 5 Billion Dollar Legacy
programme.desc: A crippled billionaire mails a letter to each of his long-lost daughters inviting them to go to Japan, in the hope that he will find a worthy heir to inherit his vast fortune. The sisters finally meet abroad the plane to Japan, and one of them is taken with a man who is going to investigate the death of his lawyer uncle in a mysterious hit-and-run.

programme.title: Mission Impossible
programme.desc: A sword master’s daughter is pursued and poisoned by an evil master when bringing back the stolen Golden Sword to the palace. She dies on the run and returns as a spirit to take revenge by killing the evil master, and soon vanishes after returning the sword to the emperor.

programme.title: Moonlight Serenade
programme.desc: A sweet inn-keeper’s daughter is witness to a perverted rape, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle. Can her true love rescue her in time? For this movie, the moonlight serenade is the sound of suspense, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle.

programme.title: The Bloody Escape
programme.desc: Ku is a skilled Kung Fu artist brought up by the bandits and does not agree with the brutal leader of the bandit’s camp. He rescues Tong, a young lady forced to become the leader’s wife, causing both the authorities and bandits to come after them. Ku has to stand up against the bandits that he grew up with so as to start a new life for himself.

programme.title: Hex
programme.desc: Constantly being abused by her cruel husband, the frail Chan Sau Ying awaits death from tuberculosis. The new servant girl Yi Wah, takes pity on her mistress’ plight and the pair proceed to drown him one evening. They dump his body in a nearby pond but Sau Ying believes that the man’s bloated corpse has risen from the bog to seek vengeance.

programme.title: Clan Of Amazons
programme.desc: The martial arts world is plunged into terror when a mysterious figure known as the 'Embroidery Bandit' starts to attack convoys of precious materials. Seemingly unstoppable, the frightened clans decide to call on the expertise of Lu Xiao Feng, an inquisitive fighter and detective to capture the culprit.

programme.title: The Bells Of Death
programme.desc: Wei Fu is an unremarkable woodcutter. However, when psychotic marauders killed his family and abducted his sister, he goes through vigorous martial arts training with an expert swordsman in order to exact revenge on the evildoers.

programme.title: Disciples Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Yi is a skilled disciple of the Hong Quan style kung fu who work in a textile mill recommended by his senior, Han. Han warns Yi not to show off his martial arts skill so as to avoid getting into trouble. However, Yi does not listen and eventually gets dangerously involved in the conflict between two opposing textile mills.

programme.title: A Taste Of Cold Steel
programme.desc: It's a no-holds-barred battle to the death for possession of the invaluable Purple Sword. Assistant director Wang Po-yi also wrote this entertaining and exciting adventure which could have also been called "The Five Tigers" since there's no doubt that this quintet is the highlight of the action. Huang Tsung-shun is "Fierce Tiger," Hung Liu is "Drunk Tiger," Hsu Erh-niu is "Lame Tiger," award-winning actor Ku Feng is "One-eyed Tiger" and respected director/actor Wu Ma is "Sick Tiger" in a tangle of tussles and thrills.

programme.title: Na Cha The Great
programme.desc: Adapted from a chapter of the classic Chinese legend “Investiture of the Gods”, this is the story of Na Cha set 3000 years ago. After Na Cha sacrificed his life to save his parents, he is reincarnated with his spirit embodied in a lotus flower and is armed with two magic weapons to save the people from their despotic emperor.

programme.title: Return To The 36Th Chamber
programme.desc: The second film of the trilogy, Gordon Liu plays Zhou Ren Jie, a man who impersonates a monk in order to learn kung fu in Shaolin, and eventually creates his own Shaolin style of ‘scaffolding kung fu”.

programme.title: Carry On Doctors And Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: The Magnificent Ruffians
programme.desc: A gang of unemployed martial artists seem to have their bad fortunes turned when the head of a local security agency hires them to take out the competition, who their new employer insists is up to no good. However, the men are being played for fools and have to take each other on until the last drop of blood is spilled.

programme.title: Till The End Of Time
programme.desc: This is Jenny Hu's stunning debut as a struggling singer who tries to keep her career and marriage intact. This movie also includes seven memorable hit songs.

programme.title: Shaolin Mantis
programme.desc: The Emperor orders Feng to find proofs of Master Tian’s rebellion in his house. Feng falls in love with Tian’s granddaughter and marries her. When he finds the proofs and tries to leave with her, his wife is killed in the fight against Tian. Feng creates the mantis-style martial arts and vows to avenge her death.

programme.title: Tragic Commitment
programme.desc: When the husband of a doctor, Tung is fatally wounded in an accident, he reveals to her about his affair with Blackie, who is impregnated with his baby. Despite the devastation of the betrayal and the eventual death of her husband, Tung is pressured by her mother-in-law into putting up with Blackie and offer $1M for her baby...

programme.title: Twelve Deadly Coins
programme.desc: When Qiao Miao is about to kill the bandit whom he just met, he is attracted by her beauty and they quickly fall in love. The two later discover the blood feud between the owner of the unique weapon - “Twelve Deadly Coins” and the old master who controls the bandit...

programme.desc: Tamil Fantasy Romantic Comedy Film, Starring, starring Ashok Selvan, Ritika Singh, and Vani Bhojan

programme.desc: Tamil Action Drama Film, starring Cheran, Saravanan, Gautham Karthik, Daniel Balaji & Others

programme.desc: A journalist who strives to investigate and uncover the reason behind an actress's mysterious demise gets embroiled in a dangerous situation.

programme.title: Maara
programme.desc: A young woman named Paaru notices a painting on the walls of a coastal town that depicts a fairy tale she once heard as a child. Intrigued, she sets out to find the person who painted it.

programme.title: Rajasingam
programme.desc: In the 1940s, an orphan girl falls prey to the torture of the feudal leader of her village who forbids her to sing. When she loses hope, her teacher inspires her with the story of the heroic Rajanna.

programme.title: 1947: Earth
programme.desc: A young Parsi girl discovers the truth about human nature as friends turn foes while the city is set aflame during partition.

programme.title: Saajan Bina Suhagan
programme.desc: Asha is in love with Raj but her dying father begs her to marry another man. Years later, Raj walks back into her idyllic life throwing everything off balance.

programme.title: Aaj Ke Angaarey
programme.desc: Priya, a school teacher, and her class of 11 children participate in an inter-school competition and travel out of town. Along the way, a group of masked bandits stop their bus and take them hostage.

programme.title: Ek Jaanbaaz Police Officer
programme.desc: Bharat, a patriotic and an honest police officer, is a force to reckon with for the criminals. When Simhadri, a gangster, threatens the peace of the state, Bharat decides to put an end to his violence

programme.title: Lailaa O Lailaa
programme.desc: Jai, special investigative agent, falls in love with Anjali and marries her. When he struggles to get hold of Victor Rana, a terrorist on the loose, he asks his wife for her help.

programme.title: Gabbar Is Back
programme.desc: The city's administration wrongs Aditya, a commoner. To avenge his tragedy, he disguises himself as a vigilante, Gabbar, and teams up with honest government officers to expose the corrupt.

programme.title: Aakhri Yudh
programme.desc: After her family forces her to get married, Kavya runs away from her house. When her brother goes in search of her, he finds her with a young man and assumes him to be her boyfriend.

programme.title: Sangdil Sanam
programme.desc: Kishan and Sanam are engaged as children but are separated when his father is accused of a robbery. Later, a grown-up Kishan sets out to claim Sanam as his bride unaware that she is a changed person.

programme.title: Sangdil Sanam
programme.desc: Kishan and Sanam are engaged as children but are separated when his father is accused of a robbery. Later, a grown-up Kishan sets out to claim Sanam as his bride unaware that she is a changed person.

programme.title: Humse Badhkar Kaun
programme.desc: Two brothers, a villager and a small time but street-smart con man, help their long-lost mother, the chief minister of the state, to oust her enemies and terrorists.

programme.title: Albela
programme.desc: Tony, a tour guide, falls in love with one of his clients, Sonia, and tries to woo her. However, Sonia does not reciprocate his feelings since she is in love with another man.

programme.title: Gabbar Is Back
programme.desc: The city's administration wrongs Aditya, a commoner. To avenge his tragedy, he disguises himself as a vigilante, Gabbar, and teams up with honest government officers to expose the corrupt.

programme.title: Rowdy Baadshah
programme.desc: Rama Rao fails to get a job with the police force due to his father's connections with a gangster. But when his brother is killed by the gangster, he sets out on the path of revenge.

programme.title: Power Unlimited
programme.desc: Tirupathi, who wants to become a police officer, must pose as ACP Baldev, his lookalike, to rescue Ganguly, the brother of the Home Minister Jayavardhan.

programme.title: Force 2
programme.desc: Hindu and Muslim factions attempt to uncover the religious identity of an underprivileged man, who dies under the weight of a politician's poster.

programme.title: Prince
programme.desc: A thief plans the robbery of a lifetime. However, he wakes up one morning to realise that he has lost his memory and his life is at stake.

programme.title: Global Baba
programme.desc: Pehlwaan, a criminal, narrowly escapes a police encounter and uses a holy man's guise to hide. Though he soon amasses a large number of followers, he continues to carry out his illegal activities.

programme.title: Shabaash Mithu: The Unheard Story
programme.desc: In Hyderabad, a young Mithali Raj fortuitously falls for the sport, cricket. As she grows up, her struggles and tribulations forge her path to the national team as a young captain.

programme.title: Trikon Ka Chauta Kon
programme.desc: Prakash, a married man, has an extramarital affair with Manisha and does not want the relationship to end while also hoping to stay married to his wife, Anuradha.

programme.title: Dandnayak
programme.desc: A young man reluctantly goes along with the plans of his spirited father, who is a farmer. One day, the duo gets caught up in a conflict over agricultural land.

programme.title: Dandnayak
programme.desc: A young man reluctantly goes along with the plans of his spirited father, who is a farmer. One day, the duo gets caught up in a conflict over agricultural land.

programme.title: Goliyon Ki Raasleela Ram-Leela
programme.desc: Ram and Leela love each other but cannot stay together as their families, Rajadi and Sanera, have been at war with each other for the past 500 years. In the end, they both need to make a sacrifice.

programme.title: Soldier
programme.desc: After Major Vijay Malhotra's colleagues betray him, he is branded as a traitor and subsequently killed. But his son, Vicky, vows to take revenge on his father's murderers and prove his innocence.

programme.title: Shabaash Mithu: The Unheard Story
programme.desc: In Hyderabad, a young Mithali Raj fortuitously falls for the sport, cricket. As she grows up, her struggles and tribulations forge her path to the national team as a young captain.

programme.title: Surya Jalta Nahi Jalata Hai
programme.desc: Chinna comes to Hyderabad for higher studies when he runs into Bhagawati's thugs and fights with them. Later, he falls in love with Maheswari, Bhagawati's sister, which complicates matters.

programme.title: Benny And Babloo
programme.desc: When their restaurant is shut down, Benny and Babloo move to Mumbai in search of jobs Their lives change when one of them gets a job at a five-star hotel while the other gets employed at a dance bar.

programme.title: Feet Up With The Stars
programme.desc: The host interacts with celebrities about their work and personal life. Meanwhile, the guests also reveal certain secrets about themselves and indulge in gossip.

programme.title: Yeh Lamhe Judaai Ke
programme.desc: Dushant, an aspiring singer, is encouraged by Jaya to achieve his dreams. However, after Dushant becomes successful, his other friends try to create misunderstandings between him and Jaya.

programme.title: Karishma Kali Kaa
programme.desc: Parvati, devotee of Goddess Kali, is raped while trying to protect the temple jewels. She is saved by a god man who grants her special powers and asks her to kill the culprits and get back the jewels.

programme.title: Blue
programme.desc: Sagar, Sam and Aarav decide to dive underwater to find treasure in a sunken ship in order to help Sam clear his debt. However, one of them has a hidden agenda of his own.

programme.title: Mumbai Delhi Mumbai

programme.title: Blade

programme.title: Final Destination
programme.desc: After a teenager has a terrifying vision of him and his friends dying in a plane crash, he prevents the accident only to have Death hunt them down, one by one.

programme.title: Dead Ringers

And later, some rare antiques fetch a fair price but further exploration of a hidden whale tusk could mean a windfall for one lucky storage hunter.

programme.title: Zodiac
programme.desc: There's more than one way to lose your life to a killer. The hunt is on for a serial killer in San Francisco. Few cases in the history of true crime are as intriguing as that of Zodiac, a bizarre gunman in an executioner's hood, who taunts the police with dozens of letters containing eerie messages and cryptograms. Director David Fincher (Panic Room, Fight Club, Se7en) captures the story of the infamous killer who terrorized the city in the late 1960s. Jake Gyllenhaal (Jarhead, The Day After Tomorrow), Robert Downey, Jr. (Kiss Kiss, Bang Bang), Anthony Edwards ("ER") and Mark Ruffalo (We Don't Live Here Anymore, Rumor Has It...) star.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 6
programme.desc: The buyers press their luck in Sin City where Brandon and Lori get outfoxed by a group of locals with a questionable strategy. Then, Jesse gambles on a locker filled with junk. Everyone thinks he's crazy, but he knows something they don't. And later,vintage slot machines and poker tables send bidding through the roof. The closing price is stratospheric, but what's hidden from sight will be the ultimate payday for one lucky Storage Hunter.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 7
programme.desc: Jesse taunts Brandon and Lori in the hopes of instigating a fight and later unearths a ticking treasure. Then, seasoned local Victor throws down his bankroll for a trove of luxury goods, but are they actually knock-offs? And later, Brandon and Lori think they've hit the jackpot with a cache of firearms, but when Lori's gun accidentally goes off inside the locker, Brandon is caught in the crosshairs.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 8
programme.desc: Brandon and Lori return to Boston and square off against his former protege Wade. The bad blood may just erupt into a full-out brawl on the auction floor. Then, a former military hero goes all in on a locker that turns out to be hiding the ultimate score. And later, the contents of a unit spark an outrage among the buyers, but Brandon only sees dollar signs. Will he walk away or will this controversial cache crush his morals?

programme.desc: Big city lawyer Hank Palmer returns to his childhood home where his estranged father, the town’s judge, is suspected of murder. He sets out to discover the truth and along the way reconnects with the family he walked away from years before.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 02
programme.desc: In a local Chicago diner, Michael brings new meaning to the term "hold the pickles." Plus, he discovers an aggressive new breed of fungus at a park, and later, he helps a coworker disappear from work early in a hospital warehouse.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 03
programme.desc: At a market, Michael reveals an amazing credit card hack, and at a science shop, he demonstrates how far stem cell research has come. Later, Michael spooks a gardener who's certain that angry gnomes are hunting him down!

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 04
programme.desc: Michael discovers a ferocious new breed of animal at a park, customers are steeped in confusion when Michael invades a local tea shop, and a woman gets her feathers ruffled when she realizes she's a witness to a transformation.

programme.title: Rizzoli & Isles S1 7
programme.desc: The Boston Marathon turns into a crime scene as a shooter targets runners. Jane and Maura must investigate in secret so as not to cause a mass panic. BALTHAZAR GETTY guest stars.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S5 10
programme.desc: Sheldon gets a dorm room all to himself, which soon becomes the campus hotspot. Meanwhile, Meemaw gets an unwanted business partner. Melissa Joan Hart directs.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S5 11
programme.desc: Sheldon acts as Mary’s spy when he’s forced to spend the night at church for a youth lock-in. Meanwhile, Georgie finds himself attracted to an older woman named Mandy (guest star Emily Osment).

programme.title: Black Mass
programme.desc: Notorious mobster "Whitey" Bulger collaborates with the FBI to eliminate a common enemy: the Italian mob. As their unholy alliance spirals out of control, Whitey becomes one of the most ruthless and powerful gangsters in Boston history.

programme.title: Grudge Match
programme.desc: Oscar® winner Robert De Niro (Raging Bull, Silver Linings Playbook) and Oscar® nominee Sylvester Stallone (the Rocky films, The Expendables) play Billy “The Kid” McDonnen and Henry “Razor” Sharp, two local Pittsburgh fighters whose fierce rivalry put them in the national spotlight. Each had scored a victory against the other during their heyday, but in 1983, on the eve of their decisive third match, Razor suddenly announced his retirement, refusing to explain why but effectively delivering a knock-out punch to both their careers. Thirty years later, boxing promoter Dante Slate Jr., seeing big dollar signs, makes them an offer they can’t refuse: to re-enter the ring and settle the score once and for all.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Easy Money - Higgins job to repossess a plane goes south when she and Magnum discover that it was being used by a drug cartel who opens fire at the plane, forcing them to crash land in the jungle, where they find a stowaway on board with a target on his back.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S3 Ep3
programme.desc: No Way Out - As Magnum, Higgins and TC try to pull one over on a customs agent to get Higgins a green card, armed gunmen suddenly storm the federal building and start taking hostages.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S3 Ep4
programme.desc: First The Beatdown, Then The Blowback - Magnum and Higgins help an up-and-coming mixed martial arts fighter who is being pressured by a gang to throw an illegal fight. Also, Kumu is arrested for stealing an artifact from a collector that should be returned to its original resting place.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S3 Ep5
programme.desc: The Day Danger Walked In - As a major hurricane hits the Island, Magnum and his friends find shelter inside La Mariana, along with two armed killers also escaping the dangerous storm. Also, Rick must confess to TC that he let the insurance lapse on the bar.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Tell No One - When a wealthy man hires Magnum and Higgins to find his missing wife, they are stunned when a tragedy occurs as a result of their investigation. Also, Kumu’s suspicion of her step-daughter’s boyfriend creates a divide with her and Kumu’s new relationship.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Killer On The Midnight Watch - When an overenthusiastic neighborhood watch group asks Magnum and Higgins to investigate a shady character living on their block, they are shocked to find that they may have inadvertently stumbled upon a serial killer on the loose.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S3 Ep8

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S3 Ep9
programme.desc: The Big Payback - When Higgins is abducted, Magnum discovers it’s retaliation related to one of his first cases on the Island, and he, Rick and TC must break out an ex-client from prison in order to save her.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S3 Ep10
programme.desc: The Long Walk Home - When an Army ranger goes missing after returning from deployment, Magnum learns of the traumatic news he received upon arriving home and must find him before survivor’s guilt consumes him.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S3 Ep11
programme.desc: The Lies We Tell - When a married woman asks Magnum and Higgins to find her lover’s killer because she doesn’t want to expose the affair to the police, they find that the victim wasn’t who he claimed to be.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S3 Ep12

programme.desc: Tell No One - When a wealthy man hires Magnum and Higgins to find his missing wife, they are stunned when a tragedy occurs as a result of their investigation. Also, Kumu’s suspicion of her step-daughter’s boyfriend creates a divide with her and Kumu’s new relationship.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Killer On The Midnight Watch - When an overenthusiastic neighborhood watch group asks Magnum and Higgins to investigate a shady character living on their block, they are shocked to find that they may have inadvertently stumbled upon a serial killer on the loose.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Someone To Watch Over Me - When a young man in need of immediate emergency surgery goes missing with a bullet lodged in his chest, Ethan asks Magnum and Higgins to find him before it’s too late.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S3 Ep9
programme.desc: The Big Payback - When Higgins is abducted, Magnum discovers it’s retaliation related to one of his first cases on the Island, and he, Rick and TC must break out an ex-client from prison in order to save her.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S3 Ep10
programme.desc: The Long Walk Home - When an Army ranger goes missing after returning from deployment, Magnum learns of the traumatic news he received upon arriving home and must find him before survivor’s guilt consumes him.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S3 Ep11
programme.desc: The Lies We Tell - When a married woman asks Magnum and Higgins to find her lover’s killer because she doesn’t want to expose the affair to the police, they find that the victim wasn’t who he claimed to be.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Dark Harvest - When a Marine Corps vet’s SUV is stolen with her service dog inside, Magnum and Higgins must find the car, the dog and the car thief who they believe may be an escaped kidnapping victim. Also, when TC is sued by a disgruntled customer, he asks Rick and Jin to help prove that he’s being scammed.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S3 Ep13
programme.desc: Cry Murder - As Magnum and Higgins work a case to recover valuable stolen truffles, they also must care for a baby left abandoned at the gates of their estate, while Kumu tries to locate the infant’s mother.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S3 Ep14
programme.desc: Whispers Of Death - A psychic hires Magnum and Higgins to prevent a murder she claims to have foreseen.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S3 Ep15
programme.desc: Before The Fall - Magnum’s Uncle Bernardo visits and reveals a shocking secret about Thomas’ mother.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S3 Ep16
programme.desc: Bloodlines - Magnum and Higgins work a stalking case involving a man with a past in espionage.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Double Jeopardy - Magnum and Higgins’ new clients hire them to find their missing brother last seen on the island, leading to Higgins being shot and TC abducted when a secret case of revenge is revealed during the investigation.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Easy Money - Higgins job to repossess a plane goes south when she and Magnum discover that it was being used by a drug cartel who opens fire at the plane, forcing them to crash land in the jungle, where they find a stowaway on board with a target on his back.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S3 Ep3
programme.desc: No Way Out - As Magnum, Higgins and TC try to pull one over on a customs agent to get Higgins a green card, armed gunmen suddenly storm the federal building and start taking hostages.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S3 Ep4
programme.desc: First The Beatdown, Then The Blowback - Magnum and Higgins help an up-and-coming mixed martial arts fighter who is being pressured by a gang to throw an illegal fight. Also, Kumu is arrested for stealing an artifact from a collector that should be returned to its original resting place.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Reef Wrecks of Bonaire - Bonaire’s fringing reef is home to thousands of species of corals, fish and other marine animals. It is also home to a collection of stunning shipwrecks. These wrecks evolve over time, becoming artificial reefs that support an incredibly diverse marine habitat.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Christmas Island - Christmas Island, over a thousand kilometres northwest of Australia’s mainland, is a speck of an island that rises out of the Indian Ocean, a tiny refuge to plants and creatures found nowhere else in the world. Birds rule its skies and it’s stunning landscapes are the stage for a miracle migration of millions.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 Ep3
programme.desc: A Busy Bay - Get ready to rumble in Marina Bay, where the Nomads and Townies are squatting while Anna and the Bay Family are away upriver. Soak up the peaceful otter life in this luxurious waterway before the surprise early return of its rightful owners.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Brought Back from the Brink - Face a life-and-death struggle with vet Bec, who gives a koala joey mouth-to-mouth, and see vet Meaghan test her microsurgical skills on a baby fruit bat’s teeny toes. Catch a bath-averse python and tag along as rescuer Jo nabs a trapped barn owl.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep2
programme.desc: A Koala Called Cavendish - Watch senior vet Tim tutor new recruit Phil through an injured koala checkup, and track the team’s solutions for animals plagued by the summer heat. Celebrate as vet Karina solves a puzzling frog case and releases an old friend who’s ready to fly.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Head & Neck - Have you ever wondered why mandrills have such colorful faces, why vultures are bald, or even why hammerheads have, well, hammer-shaped heads? Discover how animals managed to survive by evolving from the neck up.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Restless Giants - Japan is going through a seismic crisis after the devastating Tsunami of 2011. We look closely at two very dangerous volcanoes; both are considered to be in the top five most dangerous on the planet.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Monterey Bay Marine Sanctuary - On the West Coast of the United States, the Monterey Bay National Marine Sanctuary is the largest marine sanctuary in the country - home to 525 species of fish, and a massive, underwater Kelp forest.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Neuschwanstein - Learn how one of the world's most spectacular structures, Neuschwanstein castle, and its surrounding forests have become home base for many creatures. From the Alpine ibex to the majestic swans, this castle has been a natural haven for centuries.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Reef Wrecks of Bonaire - Bonaire’s fringing reef is home to thousands of species of corals, fish and other marine animals. It is also home to a collection of stunning shipwrecks. These wrecks evolve over time, becoming artificial reefs that support an incredibly diverse marine habitat.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Christmas Island - Christmas Island, over a thousand kilometres northwest of Australia’s mainland, is a speck of an island that rises out of the Indian Ocean, a tiny refuge to plants and creatures found nowhere else in the world. Birds rule its skies and it’s stunning landscapes are the stage for a miracle migration of millions.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 Ep3
programme.desc: A Busy Bay - Get ready to rumble in Marina Bay, where the Nomads and Townies are squatting while Anna and the Bay Family are away upriver. Soak up the peaceful otter life in this luxurious waterway before the surprise early return of its rightful owners.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Brought Back from the Brink - Face a life-and-death struggle with vet Bec, who gives a koala joey mouth-to-mouth, and see vet Meaghan test her microsurgical skills on a baby fruit bat’s teeny toes. Catch a bath-averse python and tag along as rescuer Jo nabs a trapped barn owl.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep2

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Restless Giants - Japan is going through a seismic crisis after the devastating Tsunami of 2011. We look closely at two very dangerous volcanoes; both are considered to be in the top five most dangerous on the planet.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Human Influenced - In geological and biological scales, humans have only been around for the blink of an eye, and yet we’ve managed to influence the evolutionary path for many animals. Explore the human impact on dogs, wolves, coyotes, elephants, and more.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Neuschwanstein - Learn how one of the world's most spectacular structures, Neuschwanstein castle, and its surrounding forests have become home base for many creatures. From the Alpine ibex to the majestic swans, this castle has been a natural haven for centuries.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Reef Wrecks of Bonaire - Bonaire’s fringing reef is home to thousands of species of corals, fish and other marine animals. It is also home to a collection of stunning shipwrecks. programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Christmas Island - Christmas Island, over a thousand kilometres northwest of Australia’s mainland, is a speck of an island that rises out of the Indian Ocean, a tiny refuge to plants and creatures found nowhere else in the world. Birds rule its skies and it’s stunning landscapes are the stage for a miracle migration of millions.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 Ep3
programme.desc: A Busy Bay - Get ready to rumble in Marina Bay, where the Nomads and Townies are squatting while Anna and the Bay Family are away upriver. Soak up the peaceful otter life in this luxurious waterway before the surprise early return of its rightful owners.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Brought Back from the Brink - Face a life-and-death struggle with vet Bec, who gives a koala joey mouth-to-mouth, and see vet Meaghan test her microsurgical skills on a baby fruit bat’s teeny toes. Catch a bath-averse python and tag along as rescuer Jo nabs a trapped barn owl.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep2
programme.desc: A Koala Called Cavendish - Watch senior vet Tim tutor new recruit Phil through an injured koala checkup, and track the team’s solutions for animals plagued by the summer heat. Celebrate as vet Karina solves a puzzling frog case and releases an old friend who’s ready to fly.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Interior - Some of the most interesting adaptations in the animal world are completely invisible. Study these hidden, internal alterations to see how different animals have evolved to survive in amazing and unseen ways.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Eyes - Why do zebras have stripes? How do penguins see underwater? And why are a tree frog’s eyes red? In this exploration of sight, discover how some animals have evolved to see extremely well while others have evolved to be nearly invisible.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 2 Ep5
programme.desc: In the Path of a Volcano - For people who live on active volcanoes, life has an element of impermanence to it. There is always the fear that one day their turn will come, and their home will be in the path of the volcano.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Mesoamerican Reef - The Mesoamerican Reef is a pristine ocean ecosystem- but after decades of overfishing and tourist activity, much of this reef is in jeopardy. These Parks are monitored by Ocean advocates dedicated to maintaining the shark feeding grounds, turtle populations and marine spawning grounds that line this incredible reef system.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Fraser Island - Just to the south of the Great Barrier Reef and the Tropic of Capricorn, Fraser Island lies like a sprawling lizard. Some 120 kilometers long and up to 25 kilometers wide, Fraser Island is now the largest sand island on Earth. Somehow on this nutrient-poor bed of sand life has thrived. Dingoes patrol its forests in search of wallabies while white-bellied sea eagles scour the beaches from above. From the lakes to the forests and its crystal clear streams - Fraser Island is a unique mosaic of unlikely habitats that have earned it World Heritage Status.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Three's a Crowd - Welcome Anna’s clan back to Marina Bay, where two otter families have been trespassing. Feel the heat when Mia catches Anna’s scent and hustles the Townies out of reach. Then hold tight as the Nomads remain blissfully unaware of the coming conflict.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Brought Back from the Brink - Face a life-and-death struggle with vet Bec, who gives a koala joey mouth-to-mouth, and see vet Meaghan test her microsurgical skills on a baby fruit bat’s teeny toes. Catch a bath-averse python and tag along as rescuer Jo nabs a trapped barn owl.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Collisions - Observe the natural and human forces that have shaped Ningaloo Reef, Cape Range, and Exmouth Gulf with Tim, Traditional Owners, and other experts. Check out a million-year-old fossil reef, a gargantuan fish, and a ray that packs quite a punch.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Connections - Follow scientists and Traditional Owners as they map out ecological links, migratory pathways, and interspecies bonds that conserve Ningaloo’s biodiversity. Frolic with whales, float among seaweed islands, and see archaeologists nix a settler myth.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Social Animals - Cooperation comes in many forms. Some animals cooperate to be social while others put the welfare of the group above their own reproductive potential. See the many ways species have evolved to work with one another in order to survive.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Ancient Lineages - Some call them “living fossils”, but that's just another way to say survivors. From the shark to the horseshoe crab, these animals' early adaptations were a success, leaving them relatively unchanged for millions of years.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Rescuers - Dogs around the world come to the rescue in surprising ways. Some search for survivors when disaster strikes or rescue animals from poachers and wildlife traffickers. Others help us in times of trouble—both on land and in the water.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Lifesavers - Meet a border collie that protects aircraft from lethal bird strikes, a sprocker spaniel whose sense of smell is saving imperilled water voles, and an Anatolian shepherd that helps conserve Africa’s most endangered big cat, the cheetah.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Partners - Meet a golden retriever that assuages anxiety and helps heal PTSD, a shepherd mix who rescues mudslide survivors, a pair of spaniels who sniff out underground water leaks, and a group of teacher’s pets in the UK that assist children learning to read.

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn - An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep1
programme.desc: January-February - the Year Begins - In the early months of the year, the Earth’s axial tilt brings the height of summer in some places and the depths of winter in others. See how life struggles to survive under these extreme conditions.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep2
programme.desc: March-April - a Time of Renewal - Travel around the globe to witness the atmospheric shifts that take place in March, from the wave of cherry blossoms that unfold across Japan to the final raft of green sea turtles that arrive on the Great Barrier Reef islands to lay eggs.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep3
programme.desc: May-June - a Time of Volatility - Watch summer unfold in the Northern Hemisphere, while regions close to the equator enter the wet season and Southern Africa goes dry, creating scarcity for some creatures and bounty for others.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Into the Heat - Meet the unlikely collaborators working to ensure mutual survival in the Kalahari Basin. Learn of an elephant clan’s symbiotic link to fruiting anaboom trees, a meerkat’s alliance with a feisty drongo bird, and more flora-and-fauna odd couples.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Pushed to the Limits - Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari, as they endure a brutally dry year. Witness co-operation between elephant herds in their desperate search for water and meet a meerkat’s strange babysitter, who helps the next generation survive.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Behind the Lens - Track scientists who have arrived in the Kalahari to test a hypothesis: that animal collaboration is the key to the dizzying diversity of the region’s species. Observe as they monitor behavior, decipher data, and deliver fascinating conclusions.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Social Animals - Cooperation comes in many forms. Some animals cooperate to be social while others put the welfare of the group above their own reproductive potential. See the many ways species have evolved to work with one another in order to survive.

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals S14 Ep2
programme.desc: Heat one continues as each chef cooks two standout Signature Dishes; a main and a dessert that demonstrate creative flair and individual cooking style.

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show S30 Ep16
programme.desc: Graham Norton presents a lively chat show featuring Michelle Yeoh, Austin Butler, Jack Lowden, Ashley Banjo and Mimi Webb.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Fiona's Narrowboat - It's all hands-on deck this week for Simon and the team, who are in Bradford-on-Avon to help single mother Fiona transform her 110-year-old narrowboat in to a thriving short rental business.

programme.title: Your Home, Made Perfect S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Hemal and Kapila - Two architects compete using virtual reality to win the opportunity to remodel a four-bedroom house near Stockport. But which option will the owners choose?

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off S12 Ep1
programme.desc: Cake Week - The 12 new bakers tackle mini rolls in the signature and a nostalgic teatime classic for the technical, and create cakes that defy the laws of physics for the showstopper.

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals S14 Ep1
programme.desc: The first four contenders face their opening Skills Test. Two must get all the details just right as they prepare bangers and mash in only 20 minutes. The others cook monkfish.

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals S14 Ep2
programme.desc: Heat one continues as each chef cooks two standout Signature Dishes; a main and a dessert that demonstrate creative flair and individual cooking style.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off S12 Ep1
programme.desc: Cake Week - The 12 new bakers tackle mini rolls in the signature and a nostalgic teatime classic for the technical, and create cakes that defy the laws of physics for the showstopper.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Cheryl & Bill's Chalet - Simon and the team are in Herefordshire to meet new parents Cheryl and Bill. The couple enlist the help of Simon and the gang to get their chalet on a hill from "flat pack" to "Scandi chic".

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall S1 Ep14
programme.desc: West Penwith is as far west as it is possible to go in mainland England. Rick explores its rich and diverse history, from Lamorna Cove, made famous through song and art, to the UNESCO-protected tin and copper mining area of Botallack.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off S12 Ep2
programme.desc: Biscuit Week - It's crunch time for the bakers as they put their twist on filled brandy snaps, make a jammy childhood favourite and create an interactive toy made exclusively from biscuit.

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals S14 Ep3
programme.desc: In the second heat, the Skills Tests involve scallops and a crème pâtissière swiss roll. Then the chefs try to impress the judges with two Signature Dishes that demonstrate their culinary identities.

programme.title: Sort Your Life Out S2 Ep5
programme.desc: The Smith family embark upon a mammoth declutter. Stacey and the team challenge them to let go of half of their possessions, so that they can beautifully reorganise their life and home.
