programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep40
programme.desc: Something Old, Something New / The Ghoster - Archibald stumbles into playing the part of a wedding planner as he attempts to help a frazzled groom pull off the perfect day. / Archibald unknowingly buys a haunted toaster and summons a ghost by mistake.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep15
programme.desc: It Crushes / Rebel Without A Paws - Eep gets struck with the crush curse when cute new guy, Kevin, comes to Ahhh! Valley. Her and Grug do everything they can to break the curse's hold/ Thunk starts to hang out with liyotes against Grug's wishes when he has a hard time fitting in with kids from school.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep40
programme.desc: Lucky and the Railroad Ransom - When Butch LePray hold Jim for ransom, Lucky and Spirit team up with the unlikeliest of allies to get her father back

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep14
programme.desc: Raiders of the Lost Park - When Audrey's big sister, Zoe, and her friends take over the park, Audrey needs all the Harvey Kids to help beat the bigger kids.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep14
programme.desc: Gypsy Moth Prophecies / Skidzo-Brainia - A fortune-telling moth forecasts doom for Whiplash and though Whip is skeptical, the crew tries to keep him safe so the it doesn't come true. // Skidmark learns the crew is tired of his crazy behavior so he invents a helmet that changes his personality in unpredictable ways.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep2
programme.desc: Delivery Disaster / Slippery Business - When Donna's delivery truck breaks down, it's up to the crew to help Donna continue delivering packages to Harmony Harbor's residents. / When the crew takes on a mission to rescue a lost pet, Ellie must face her fears in order to help save the day.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep40
programme.desc: Something Old, Something New / The Ghoster - Archibald stumbles into playing the part of a wedding planner as he attempts to help a frazzled groom pull off the perfect day. / Archibald unknowingly buys a haunted toaster and summons a ghost by mistake.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep35
programme.desc: Tone Death - After the Riders save a Deathsong egg from the Dragon Hunters, they must take it back to Melody Island when the hatched baby won't stop crying.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep24
programme.desc: Clickety Clacks / Rocksy’s Thing - Rocksy’s “talent” goes to her head when she and Berry accidentally invent tap dancing. / Rocksy finds one end of a shoelace and tasks her friends with helping her free it so she can have a thing of her very own.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep18
programme.desc: Mermaid - To prove he's a ladies' man, Puss rescues a mermaid, who instantly falls in love with him … and becomes his worst nightmare

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep35
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ghastly Danger of the Ghost Dentist - The pressure's on Harold and George to tell the scariest campfire story ever. Perhaps their tale of an ill-fated frontier dentist will do the trick.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep36
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Confounding Concoction of the Crooked Combotato - A fierce game of plot potato takes an unexpected twist when Melvin unleashes one of his most fiendish -- and carb-loaded -- creations yet.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep35
programme.desc: Hitting the Sky Note / Hug Fest - When Poppy discovers that Sky Toronto doesn’t sing, she sets out to convince him that singing is the greatest joy in the world./Poppy shows Branch around his first Hug Fest, a Troll festival to celebrate hugs.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep36
programme.desc: Chummy Sparklestone / Giggleyum - When the Funtime Factory stops producing one of their frosting flavors, Poppy sets out to create a replacement. But is her new flavor, Giggleyum too delicious?/During a Troll mystery party, Cooper has the role of detective. But when the party is over, Detective Cooper – now “Chummy Sparklestone” – refuses to break character, and he’s causing problems around the village!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep36
programme.desc: Halloween - Boss Baby uses the cover of Halloween Night to sneak into Bubeezee’s Headquarters to shut it all down. Tim covers for Boss by distracting Marisol with a night of trick or treating.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep37
programme.desc: Who's a Good Baby? - A brainwashed Boss Baby breaks free from overly sanitized Bubbeezee products. He rallies the Playgroup Babies to run the company out of business by breaking every product in town.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep18
programme.desc: Danger in the Forbidden City - Po and the Kids finally arrive in the Forbidden City. After an assassination scare, Xiao enlists Po and the 4Cs for help protecting her during her father's funeral.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep36
programme.desc: Between A Rock And A Hard Place - When Hiccup and the Riders discover that Viggo is using two captured Catastrophic Quakens to build a dragon prison, they must help the dragons escape.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep35
programme.desc: Tone Death - After the Riders save a Deathsong egg from the Dragon Hunters, they must take it back to Melody Island when the hatched baby won't stop crying.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep24
programme.desc: Clickety Clacks / Rocksy’s Thing - Rocksy’s “talent” goes to her head when she and Berry accidentally invent tap dancing. / Rocksy finds one end of a shoelace and tasks her friends with helping her free it so she can have a thing of her very own.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep18
programme.desc: Mermaid - To prove he's a ladies' man, Puss rescues a mermaid, who instantly falls in love with him … and becomes his worst nightmare

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep35
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ghastly Danger of the Ghost Dentist - The pressure's on Harold and George to tell the scariest campfire story ever. Perhaps their tale of an ill-fated frontier dentist will do the trick.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep36
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Confounding Concoction of the Crooked Combotato - A fierce game of plot potato takes an unexpected twist when Melvin unleashes one of his most fiendish -- and carb-loaded -- creations yet.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep35
programme.desc: Hitting the Sky Note / Hug Fest - When Poppy discovers that Sky Toronto doesn’t sing, she sets out to convince him that singing is the greatest joy in the world./Poppy shows Branch around his first Hug Fest, a Troll festival to celebrate hugs.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep36
programme.desc: Chummy Sparklestone / Giggleyum - When the Funtime Factory stops producing one of their frosting flavors, Poppy sets out to create a replacement. But is her new flavor, Giggleyum too delicious?/During a Troll mystery party, Cooper has the role of detective. But when the party is over, Detective Cooper – now “Chummy Sparklestone” – refuses to break character, and he’s causing problems around the village!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep36
programme.desc: Halloween - Boss Baby uses the cover of Halloween Night to sneak into Bubeezee’s Headquarters to shut it all down. Tim covers for Boss by distracting Marisol with a night of trick or treating.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep37
programme.desc: Who's a Good Baby? - A brainwashed Boss Baby breaks free from overly sanitized Bubbeezee products. He rallies the Playgroup Babies to run the company out of business by breaking every product in town.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep18
programme.desc: Danger in the Forbidden City - Po and the Kids finally arrive in the Forbidden City. After an assassination scare, Xiao enlists Po and the 4Cs for help protecting her during her father's funeral.

programme.desc: Between A Rock And A Hard Place - When Hiccup and the Riders discover that Viggo is using two captured Catastrophic Quakens to build a dragon prison, they must help the dragons escape.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep18
programme.desc: Snoutlout Gets The Axe - When Snotlout and Astrid must fly a ceremonial battle axe to a family wedding, they must work together when an Armorwing dragon derails their plan

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep24
programme.desc: Clickety Clacks / Rocksy’s Thing - Rocksy’s “talent” goes to her head when she and Berry accidentally invent tap dancing. / Rocksy finds one end of a shoelace and tasks her friends with helping her free it so she can have a thing of her very own.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep18
programme.desc: Mermaid - To prove he's a ladies' man, Puss rescues a mermaid, who instantly falls in love with him … and becomes his worst nightmare

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep56
programme.desc: Poppy The Line Dancing Queen - Poppy is having a line dancing party, but none of the other flowertots know how to do it. Will any of them learn to dance in time or will Poppy have to cancel the party?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep57
programme.desc: King Stingo - Aunt Tulip has lost Grubby again. When Stingo finds him, he asks to be made King as a reward. It isn't long before he has gone too far and the tots are all fed up with his demands. Can Fifi get life in the garden back to normal?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep58
programme.desc: Hide And Seek - The tots are playing hide and seek and the winner will get Fifi's delicious jam tarts. Who will win, Stingo and Slugsy are sure it will be them!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep59
programme.desc: My Friend Fifi - Fifi and Bumble fall out in a big way after Fifi doesn't show up to the picnic they are supposed to have together. How strange that Stingo is trying to get them to be friends again, or is it?

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep17
programme.desc: When Will The Water Come Back? - Jess is concerned that all the water on the farm is frozen and sets about working out when it will come back. He works out that once the sun is out the ice melts and learns all about freezing and melting..

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep18
programme.desc: How Can We Paint The Lilly Pad Green? - Mimi is trying to prepare for a visit from Horace and wants the hutch to feel like home for her froggy friend. Jess promises to paint the special seat Mimi has made for Horace green for her, but first he has to work out how to make green from different colours.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep19
programme.desc: Where's My Feather Gone? - Jess thinks that Little Bird has dropped a feather as a gift for him to keep and play with so he's very worried when it goes missing. He searches for it and finally he finds it, right in Little Bird's nest, keeping her warm.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep20
programme.desc: Where Have All The Stars Gone? - Jess is having a sleepover and wants to wish on a star with the puppies like Willow has told them to. But they all fall asleep. When he wakes in the morning to find the stars are gone he has to work out why and when they'll be back

programme.title: Olivia Ep19
programme.desc: Olivia Leads A Parade - As Mother tries to get baby William to sleep, Olivia, Ian and Julian create a backyard parade. When Francine finds out, she decides she's going to make her OWN parade. Olivia eventually sees that two parades can be better than one –and even figures out how to keep fussy William asleep.

programme.title: Olivia Ep20
programme.desc: Olivia Tends To The Sick - Julian comes down with a case of “itchyfootitis,” so it's Dr. Olivia to the rescue, with all kinds of silly treatments. When the “condition” begins to spread to others, Olivia imagines herself running an entire “itchy foot” clinic, and eventually discovers the perfect cure.

programme.title: Olivia Ep21
programme.desc: Olivia And The Babies - After noticing all the great compliments Mother receives on account of adorable baby William, Olivia finds herself some babies of her own: her cat Edwin and her dog Perry. Being a mum is tougher than it seems, but when Mother asks Olivia to watch William for a minute, her new skills come in handy.

programme.title: Olivia Ep22
programme.desc: Olivia's Pirate Treasure - When Olivia and her family go to the beach, Olivia finds what she thinks is a pearl-making oyster. She enlists Ian and Julian to help her find more, imagining that they're pirates in search of buried treasure. In reality, Father explains that they've actually found clams: no pearls inside, but great for a clambake!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep17
programme.desc: Why Crocodile Has A Bumpy Back - You see there was a time when Crocodile didn't have a bumpy back. His skin was all smooth and he had to be very careful of the hot Tinga Tinga sun. One day whilst napping Crocodile gets very sunburnt and falls into a deep sleep. Lion warns all the animals to be on their guard as the Wildebeest have returned to Tinga Tinga and they could stampede at any moment. Crocodile misses the meeting, snoring under the hot sun. The animals try to warn snappy Crocodile… but it's too late and the Wildebeest stampede! OOOoof! …. All over Crocodile. From that day on Crocodile has a bumpy back and is grumpier and snappier than ever! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep18
programme.desc: Why Jackal Howls At The Moon - You see there was a time when Jackal didn't howl at the moon. He was a trickster and he always wanted what was not rightfully his. Jackal took over Hen's nest and Aardvark's burrow. He even took the cub's supper from Mama Cheetah! Enough was enough! All the animals decide to teach Jackal a lesson and make him believe that the Moon is made of the sweetest, most delicious honey in Tinga Tinga. Of course, Jackal instantly wants some… but it never comes. From that day on Jackal howls up at the moon, waiting for another drop of delicious MOOoooon honey! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep19
programme.desc: Why Hare Hops - You see there was a time when Hare didn't hop. He was one of the speediest animals in Tinga Tinga but none of the other animals wanted to race with him because Hare always won and it was becoming boring. Then one day, slow but clever Tortoise decides to challenge Hare. Hare can't believe his luck, but Tortoise wins and he wins and he wins! When Hare realizes that it's not such fun being on the losing end, Tortoise finally lets Hare hop past the finishing line in first place! Well it's not good to win all the time. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep20
programme.desc: Why Mosquito Buzzes - You see there was time when Mosquito didn't buzz. Mosquito was as quiet as quiet can be… and did she like to tell tales. One day Mosquito tells the Monkeys that the sun looks very low in the sky. ‘Maybe it's sad and doesn't want to rise!' worry the Monkeys. Mosquito flits off to spread the news - ‘The sun is never going to rise again!' – soon the whole of Tinga Tinga is in complete panic – ‘The Sun is never going to rise again!' Of course, the sun does rise again and all is right again in Tinga Tinga. But the animals decide to tie a grass around Mosquito's tail. From that day on Mosquito buzzes and everyone can swot her away rather than listen to her gossipy tales. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep10
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Flustering Mindless Woe of the Flushable Memory Wipes - After being made fun of for sitting in chocolate pudding, George and Harold go into hiding only to come back to find that everybody has forgotten who they are

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep11
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Soggy Salvation of the Swirling Sweatnami - Tired of mean Mr. Krupp, the boys go back in time to prevent him from becoming a bully, but discover that their plan has backfired when they return to the present

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep6
programme.desc: The Constipation Situation - Boss Baby struggles to take a sick day even though a mysterious baby cry is wreaking havoc on the neighborhood baby-love

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep7
programme.desc: The Boss Babysitter - Mom and Dad Templeton do the unthinkable: leave Boss Baby and Tim under the authority of a babysitter!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep67
programme.desc: Save The Cat - The search continues as Puss, Dulcinea, Artephius and Toby must complete task after task to gather the San Lorenzans and defeat the thieves who have a dangerous plan for the

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep41
programme.desc: Extreme Sleepover Club / Vega Swift - Smidge, Guy, Cooper, and Biggie throw an impromptu sleepover in the Fun Factory. But when unexpected visitors show up, will they avoid getting in trouble?/ Satin and Chenille are tasked with babysitting Luna Swift, Nova’s toddler niece. But she proves to be a bit of a handful

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep41
programme.desc: The Neverending Clover - After Clover is knocked unconscious, the entire kingdom plays along when she wakes up believing she's living in a make-believe storybook world

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep41
programme.desc: Lucky and the Flight of the Fancy - Lucky, Julian and Aunt Cora get swept away in Julian’s new hot air balloon and must fend for themselves in the wilderness

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep15
programme.desc: A New York Minute - Odlulu is overwhelmed by the pace of NYC, so she uses the Slo-Mo Key to make the city move at a snail's pace. When the key's effects threaten a marathon, Waldo and Wenda are determined to get it back. The Wanderers must pursue Odlulu to save the marathon.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep2
programme.desc: Dark Park Bark Lark \ The Fast and the Curious - Tag and Scooch team up to get all of Scooch's chores done in time for the Barkapellas Bark In the Park In the Dark concert. \ Tag is so excited to join the Sam Whippet’s Race Cadets. But when Tag and Scooch show up at the racetrack, there’s lots of competition. And to complete the first challenge - a pedal car race - they’re going to have to work together.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep3
programme.desc: You (Don't) Snooze, You Lose / Save The Squasher - When the crew takes on a mission to help Ian get some rest for a Badminton Tournament, Jax realises that the biggest approach isn't always the best approach. / When Lula loses her comic book, Ari learns that the best heroes rely on teamwork and not gadgets.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep15
programme.desc: Double Finked - Magnus's nephew, Axel, arrives on the island and tells the Rescue Riders that he wants to join their team. But is he just a trickster like his uncle?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep29
programme.desc: The Case Of The Toyland Mischief Maker - When Big Ears' teapot goes missing, Noddy is surprised to find it hanging from a lamp post. And when Bumpy's kennel goes missing too, it's clear there's a mischief maker in Toyland. Noddy needs to investigate before Toyland descends into chaos. Using his investigating kit and with Revs and Bumpy to help, Noddy discovers that it was the Naughticorns playing a game of Dare and daring each other to do silly things. The Naughticorns apologise for creating mischief in Toyland and Noddy finds a way for everyone to play the dare game together – safely! Go, Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep30
programme.desc: The Case Of The Popping Balloons - Noddy and his friends are each given a balloon at the end of Smartysaurus's Science Party. But when lots of the balloons start going pop, Noddy decides to investigate why. Realising that someone must be hiding and popping them, he follows the clues to PatPat and then to the Naughticorns before eventually working out that the balloon poppers are the Ninjas. They've been playing their favourite game: Ninja-Balloon-Pop! Noddy helps them to see that while they were having fun, everyone else was getting upset. Back at the Dino-Lab, the Ninjas apologise and this time everyone happily joins in with a game of Ninja-Balloon-Pop. Case closed! Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep41
programme.desc: The Saddle-Ridge Cup / Mayor Brock - Archibald accidentally volunteers a rag-tag group of Crackridge locals in an important game of Crackarack against Saddlerock. / When Mayor Fowler is away for the day, Archibald assumes Brock is now the Mayor of Crackridge.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep16
programme.desc: Grug Vs Math / Footless - Amber announces that math is the new skill that every hunter must have. Grug cannot seems to grasp the concept and enlists Squawk to help him/Grug and Snoot ban dancing when it causes a rock slide. Eep sets up an underground dance club against the adults' wishes.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep41
programme.desc: Lucky and the Flight of the Fancy - Lucky, Julian and Aunt Cora get swept away in Julian’s new hot air balloon and must fend for themselves in the wilderness

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep15
programme.desc: Dottle Rocket / Weekend at Audrey's - Dot's model rocket goes up but doesn't come down. Audrey accidentally breaks Lotta's virtual pet, but pretends it's still alive.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep15
programme.desc: No Can Do / Adopt-A-Toad - Chet is determined to open a giant can of tomato juice lands in town and Turbo worries that Chet is becoming obsessed with the can. // Turbo donates his race winnings an animal charity, but accidentally adopts a toad who moves into the clubhouse and becomes an obnoxious house guest.

programme.desc: Twig Tat / The Gnome - After getting advice from the Yard Tree, Twig gets a carve (like a tattoo) but he gets more and more carves and ends up going too far. / Upon finding a giant, offensive garden gnome, TMOs debate whether to destroy it or consider it art.

programme.desc: Bees - Puss is terrified by an invasion by a swarm of bees, which only the hippy-like “Piper” can control with her magic flute.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ludicrous Lunacy of the Loopy Laserlightmare - Despite being terrible at the job, Krupp wants to be the camp director again next summer. That's something Harold and George simply cannot abide.

programme.desc: Glamping / A Flower for Poppy - Branch is excited to take the Troll children camping with him. programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep38
programme.desc: The Partier's Apprentice / Hair Ball - Guy is running himself ragged trying to be the life of the party for every party in Troll Village. programme.desc: Yellow 100 - Finally promoted to CEO, Boss Baby sets his sights on achieving 100% Baby Love, while dealing with the annoying Puppies and Preeks who rented Baby Corp office space while Boss was gone. Tim and Danny become local heroes after saving a baby's life.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep61
programme.desc: Pip's Playground - Pip is feeling bored and wants something new to play. Fifi has a brilliant idea and asks all the tots to help her build a playground for Pip as a surprise.

programme.desc: Mud Sculptures - It has been raining and the garden is muddy. The tots decide to make mud sculptures. But what will they all do with the sculptures when they are finished?

programme.desc: Stingo's Naughty Day - Stingo is bored and plays all manner of naughty tricks on the other tots. Fifi teaches Stingo that he will have more fun if he helps people rather than being mean to them.

programme.desc: How Can We Make Music For Mimi? - Mimi has lost the handle to her music box and can't hear her music. Jess works out how to make instruments and get all the friends involved in making a little orchestra and performing a fantastic song to cheer mimi up.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep22
programme.desc: How Can We Find Sammy Snail? - Jess helps Mimi to find her little frend Sammy Snail who's gone missing. They check all the places she's seen him before and work out that if they follow the silvery train it leads right to him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Rock Pools - Granny and Grandpa Pig take Peppa and George to a beach with lots of rocks and little rock pools to explore. They all have fun with a little crab, a seashell and a fossil. Peppa rescues a little fish in her bucket and puts it back in the sea.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Teddy's Day Out - Peppa and her family are having a picnic. Mr Zebra the Postman and Zoë Zebra are having a picnic too, so they decide to have one big picnic. When it’s home time, Peppa leaves her teddy behind.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Emily Elephant - There's a new pupil at the playgroup, Emily Elephant. Everybody wants to be her friend because she is very good at building blocks and can make a loud noise with her trunk.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep157
programme.desc: The Magic Trick - Anna and Christopher are amazed by Ron's magic trick! When Ron teaches Anna how to be a magician, she wants to make Christopher disappear! Christopher is transformed into a balloon and the balloon into Froga!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep158
programme.desc: Go Find it ! - Today, Christopher organises the game of the day. He lists objects that his friends must bring back, the 1st team who does, win the game. But the objects are not easy to gather: the sun, a rocket ship, or a house!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Blue's Show and Tell Surprise - Sharpen your pencils, because Josh and Blue are going to SCHOOL! While Blue and her friends go through their school day, we play Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to share at Show and Tell.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep406
programme.desc: Pups Save Jake's Cake / Pups Save a Wild Ride - Ryder and the Pups need to help get a surprise birthday ice cream cake up to Jake's cabin. // Alex and Daring Danny X are snowboarding right for Risky Ridge and need help from the PAW Patrol.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep803
programme.desc: Pups Save a Clown - The Pups must save Humdinger and his kittens when they mess around with Toodles the Clown's tiny clown car.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Doctor Steel Little / Astonished And Amazed - Sir Steel unwittingly took over Bobbi's role to communicate with baby animals, with the help of his animal translator. // In his quest to win the Platinum City Flower Show, Sir Steel created super seeds that grow into gigantic mazes.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Attack Of The Drones / Slime Time - Steel's automated delivery drones create chaos in the city and forest. Kai has to disable the drones real quick! // When Sir Steel's Slime Machine starts shooting slime everywhere, Bobbi has to pilot the Deer Squad Rescue Carrier to save the city.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Paddington and the Vegetable Thief / Paddington Takes to the Ice - Who's trying to steal Mr. Curry's prized Giant Pumpkin? PC Wells & Paddington are on the case. // There's an ice rink in the Park & Mr. Gruber teaches Paddington how to skate for the ice disco but will be brave the ice himself again after a fall?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Pizza - Tiny Chef makes pizza and learns that friendship is more important than toppings when Ruby eats all the basil!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep816
programme.desc: Pups Stop a Super Shaker / Pups Save a Flying Farmhouse - Farmer Al's harvest machine goes haywire and shakes up Adventure Bay, even threatening to rock the Lookout off its foundation. // Farmer Al has a wild dream that the Paw Patrol must rescue he and Yumi when his animals start acting like humans.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep817
programme.desc: Pups Save a Box Fort / Pups Save Travelin' Travis From Really Big Bill! - The Pups must save Rocky and Humdinger from a runaway box fort. // When Skye helps Traveling Travis search for Big Bill Island, the misguided explorer gets carried away by a really, really big bird.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Center of a Tension - Bossy and Turtle have their first sleepover ever.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Cart-tastrophe - Bossy schemes to get Turtle new Boom Boom Super Satang cards.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Turtle's Shell Day - Bossy plans a Shell Day party for Turtle without considering what Turtle wants.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: The Lost Jelly / Coral Dilemma - When a visitor blows into Carnivore Cove, Baby's communication skills are put to the test. // When Vigo steals the color from the coral in Carnivore Cove, it's up to Super Shark and Captain Kelp to bring it back!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Legendary Loot / Yup Day - After finding a map to the Legendary Loot, the Shark family splits up to hunt the treasure down. // Baby convinces Daddy to say 'yup' to everything for a day. What's the worst that could happen?

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Little Shrimp, Big Problems - The grand opening of Martín's paleta shop is almost ruined when a mysterious creature begins wreaking havoc in Merlandia.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Chickcharney Island / The Lost Girl in a Canoe - With the help of their new friends, the Chickcharneys, Santi and crew must stop Pepito from stealing their treasured drum. // The crew meet a Chamorro girl with a broken canoe who has been magically transported to their ocean.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep210
programme.desc: George's Friend - George and Rebecca Rabbit's little brother Richard each have a toy dinosaur but they are not very good at sharing their toys. Mummy Pig shows them that they can have much more fun at the playground if they play together, just like their big sisters.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep604
programme.desc: The Children's Fete - The school roof is leaky again, so the children organize a fair to raise money for a new roof.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep211
programme.desc: The Boat Pond - Peppa and her family and friends are playing at the pond with their toy boats. Everyone has a boat to play with except Rebecca Rabbit. Daddy Pig makes Rebecca a boat out of newspaper. Rebecca’s paper boat is so nice; everyone wants one.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Mr Scarecrow - The birds keep eating the seeds from Grandpa Pig's flower garden. Peppa and George make a scarecrow, which stops the birds from eating. But Peppa is worried that the birds are hungry, so Granny Pig gives the birdies a birdfeeder with their own seeds.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep213
programme.desc: The Time Capsule - Peppa and her school friends are making a time capsule. They each put one of their favourite things inside and bury it in the school garden. The children discover that their parents made a time capsule many years ago.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep617
programme.desc: Going Boating - Everyone has come to the lake to go boating, Miss Rabbit has all sorts of boats for hire. All the families have a race and Daddy Pig wishes he hadn't picked a boat which has to be peddled.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Greedyguts / Where is Bali? - A goat has escaped from the mountain and is coming to wreak havoc, devouring everything in its path! // Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her. They have no idea that a nice surprise awaits them!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep703
programme.desc: The Super Skateboard - It's Grammy's birthday but Crusher doesn't have enough money for a special gift! So, Blaze and AJ help him do different jobs and earn the money for Grammy's present. But, they have to hurry so they can be back in time for Grammy's birthday party!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep704
programme.desc: Knights in Sparkling Armor - When Crusher and Pickle are trapped inside a cage over a bubbling slime swap, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Sparkle to become...Knights! Will they be able to rescue Crusher and Pickle from the swamp before it's too late?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep907
programme.desc: Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art - Julius loses his tooth and has a dream that the Paw Patrol saves a bumbling Tooth Fairy. // When all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival, the PAW Patrol must solve the Missing Art Mystery and return all the paintings.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Pups Save a Playful Dragon / Pups Save the Critters - Buddy, the playful dragon from one of Alex's books, gets out and the pups need to get him back. // Francois's trailer unhooked, and all of his critters have gotten loose!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: A Tail Of Two Fathers / The Welcome Wagon - It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp. // When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: A Shark Day's Night - The Tentacools (Baby, William, and Vola) get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Paddington Celebrates Mrs Birds Day / Paddington The Table Tennis Champ! - It's Mrs. Bird Day & Paddington wants to make a cake with a Special jar of Marmalade but no one can open it - how will he show his appreciation? // Paddington & Mateo form a table tennis team and the beat the table hogs so everyone can play!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Paddington Gets Fit / Paddington's Rocking Chair Repair - It's the annual fun run in Windsor Gardens park, Paddington however is not very fit so Mrs. Bird decides to train him! // Jonathan Judy and Paddington accidentally break Mrs. Bird's much-loved rocking chair! How will they fix it before she finds out?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Recycling - Peppa and George help Mummy Pig tidy up the breakfast things. Mummy Pig tells them that bottles go into a special green box to be recycled. Old newspapers go in a red box and tins go in a blue box. Peppa and George have fun filling the boxes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Daddy Pig's Office - Peppa and George are visiting Daddy Pig’s office today. Daddy Pig works with Mr Rabbit and Mrs Cat. Mr. Rabbit’s job is all about numbers, Mrs Cat‘s job is all about drawing shapes on the computer, and Daddy Pig’s job is complicated.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Pirate Island - Grandpa and Granny Pig are taking Peppa, George and their friends to Pirate Island. Grandpa shows how to use his metal detector to find treasures and they all build a big sandcastle.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Jumble Sale - Peppa’s playgroup is holding a jumble sale to raise money for a new roof and Madame Gazelle asks everyone to bring something to sell. Peppa and her friends bring in an old toy but they soon realise that favourite toys can be hard to let go of.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep522
programme.desc: A Load of Litterbugs! - On the U.S.S. Recycler, Captain Deema and her crew strive to leave every planet cleaner than they found it. But their mission is put to the test when a crew of messy Litterbugs, led by the evil Garbage Khan, take over their ship!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep214
programme.desc: What I Like About Blue - It's LOVE DAY! Josh and Blue LOVE Love Day, and Blue is making YOU something very special. While we play Blue's Clues to figure out what she's making, we help Slippery finish his Love Day Cards and help cheer up our sad Heart Friends.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Blue's Big Neighborhood Adventure - Josh and Blue are Neighborhood Heroes, helping everyone they meet as they explore our neighborhood. We play Blue's Clues to figure out where Blue wants to go in the neighborhood and make very important stop to make pizza with Mr. Oregano!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Little Shrimp, Big Problems - The grand opening of Martín's paleta shop is almost ruined when a mysterious creature begins wreaking havoc in Merlandia.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep217
programme.desc: The Secret Room - Pepito traps our Pirate Protectors inside a secret room in El Escondite that they can only escape from by working together.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Shark House Rock / Toothpaste Tumble - Baby Shark helps Mommy find the perfect musical instrument to play in their family band. // Daddy is embarrassed after Grandpa and Baby post a funny video of him on ChewTube.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Way of the Gran-Gran - Bossy and Turtle learn how to be patient from the Master.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Spring Kick-off Games - Gran-Gran; Bossy is tired of losing at the Spring Kickoff Games.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Show and Smell - Bossy and Turtle bring fun and weird smelling food for "Show and Smell".

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep907
programme.desc: Pups Save the Tooth Fairy - Julius loses his tooth and has a dream that the Paw Patrol saves a bumbling Tooth Fairy.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep405
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sleepover / Pups Save the Carnival - Farmer Al's animals go missing during a sleepover. // Cornelius has escaped from the pig ride at the carnival, and the prizes have gone missing too!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep620
programme.desc: George's Balloon - George is finding it difficult to keep hold of his big balloon. Can anyone stop it from flying off to the moon?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep621
programme.desc: Pirate Treasure - Pirate Peppa and friends put together a chest of treasure and bury it in a marked spot. Soon Pedro needs to follow the trail as he realises he has lost something.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep622
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit in Space - Grampy Rabbit visits Peppa's playgroup to talk about space rockets. The talk is going very well until suddenly Grampy Rabbit looses his voice. Can Doctor Brown Bear get him talking again?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep165
programme.desc: The Mysterious Visitor - Bubu is eager to meet a real space alien so he builds a homemade antenna and sound box to communicate with outer space. He is amazed when he and Ron discover two glowing eyes. It must be the space alien!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep166
programme.desc: The Squeaky Boots - Christopher leads the friends in a fun game of HIDE AND SEEK. But Froga soon realizes that her new boots are letting out a noisy SQEEEAK. When a pesky mosquito enters the picture and threatens to ruin the winning prize!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Tickety's Big Musical Morning - Good Morning! We celebrate morning routines with Tickety as we sing a brand-new wakeup song and play a timely game of Blue's Clues to figure out what special time is coming up.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep216
programme.desc: It's YOUR Birthday - It's YOUR birthday! DJ Slip has the music, Mr. Salt and Mrs. Pepper are making a very special birthday cake, and we play Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to play at your party! As we celebrate, we play games and gather prizes for a pinata!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep411
programme.desc: Pups Save Big Hairy / Pups Save a Flying Kitty - Pups need to lure a big ape onto the PAW Patroller so they can take him back to the jungle. // Skye Kitty gets stuck beside an eagle's nest and needs help getting down.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Captain Steel / Wash Out - Whilst some of the Deer Squad down with flu, Sir Steel tries to become a superhero with disastrous results. // Sir Steel 'borrows' water from Crystal Lake for his Water Park in the city, but things soon go wrong!

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Gravity Calamity / Ball of Chaos - Sir Steel gets Professor Scratch to create an anti-gravity ray, which goes wrong in the hands of Ricardo! // Muffin's super bouncy ball threatens to wreck the annual Winter Festival! Kai learns to sacrifice something he loves for the greater good!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Paddington's Space Adventure / Paddington's Blackberry Treasure - Join Paddington as he takes off & becomes the world's first Bearonaut thanks to the Brown family! // Jonathan, Judy & Paddington pick all the blackberries in the garden but Mr. Curry seems to think some are his- should they give them back?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Freeze Pops - Tiny Chef makes ice pops but can't wait for them to freeze! He learns that patience is an important part of cooking.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep821
programme.desc: Dancing with Luke Stars! / Pups Save a Mischievous Octopus - A dance contest being judged by Luke Stars goes wrong when a floating dancefloor carries the contestants away. // The pups investigate a mystery at an undersea-themed museum exhibit and discover an octopus that wants to return to the ocean

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep822
programme.desc: Pups Save the Kitties and the Kiddies / Pups Save the Green House - Mayor Humdinger babysits his new friend's children, but trouble arises when they start feuding with his kitties. // When Mayor Goodway and Mayor Humdinger gets accidentally locked in a greenhouse and need rescued from an exotic plant inside.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Don't Look Now - During a sleepover Bossy and Turtle watch a scary movie but may have bitten off more than they can chew.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Missing Falcon - Bossy and Turtle go full gumshoe to find Bissy's missing plushy.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Happy Bestie-versary - Bossy and Turtle decide to exchange gifts for their first annual friendship anniversary.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: A Mail Whale Tale / Swimming With The Sharks - When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure. // Baby and his family get their own reality TV show-- what could go wrong?

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep106
programme.desc: When You Wish Upon a Fish / Shark-Off - Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain and make a wish on the legendary shooting starfish, Ol' Sea Breeze. // Shadow challenges Baby Shark to a Shark-Off to prove who's the sharkiest shark.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Pig Island - When Barbarito swipes the Windless Sail from Pig Island, the crew teams up their new pig friends to retrieve it.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep210
programme.desc: The Time Capsule / Hiccup Soup - Santi and crew get magically transported to the past, where they team up with young Abuelo to get back to the present! // When faced with a case of magical hiccups, Santi and his crew must collect ingredients to make the cure-all Hiccup Soup.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep221
programme.desc: Tiny Creatures - Peppa and George are playing in Grandpa Pig's garden when they find a little snail. Then Grandpa also shows them his beehive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep621
programme.desc: Pirate Treasure - Pirate Peppa and friends put together a chest of treasure and bury it in a marked spot. Soon Pedro needs to follow the trail as he realises he has lost something.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep222
programme.desc: The Sports Day - It is Sports Day at Peppa’s playgroup. There are lots of exciting events, including running, jumping and the “tug of war”. Daddy Pig tells Peppa that it’s not the winning that matters.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep223
programme.desc: GrandDad Dog's Garage - Peppa’s car runs out of petrol but thankfully Granddad Dog’s garage isn’t far away. With one phone call, Granddad Dog is on his way. He tows Peppa’s car back to his garage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep224
programme.desc: The Balloon Ride - Peppa wins the top prize in a raffle at school: a trip in a hot air balloon. Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig, George and Peppa climb aboard and enjoy the flight until the balloon gets caught in a tree. Luckily, the balloon has landed in a very familiar garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep526
programme.desc: Madame Gazelle's Leaving Party - The children are sad because their favorite teacher, Madame Gazelle, is leaving daycare. But a leaving party will give her a good send-off.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Barbabright Has a Secret / Super Duper Cool - Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out. // The Barbapapa decide to save energy. But their efforts are undermined by Barbabright and Barbabelle who build a secret energy-consuming project.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep705
programme.desc: Paramedic Power - When Blaze's friends need help, Ambulance Blaze, Paramedic AJ and Paramedic Gabby have all the tools they need to save the day!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep706
programme.desc: The Snowflake Games - It's a head-to-head showdown when Blaze and Crusher enter... The Snowflake Games! Who will win the most winter sports and receive the prized Snowflake Medal?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep408
programme.desc: Pups Save the Flying Food / Pups Save a Ferris Wheel - Mr. Porter's delivery drones have gone out of control, and now they are air-dropping food everywhere! // Mayor Humdinger steals Adventure Bay's Ferris Wheel.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep908
programme.desc: Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand - When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs - ones that hatch. // Traveling Travis volunteers to watch Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al's Farm and characteristically messes up everything.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Masked Fishy / The Best Friends Game - When a mysterious masked fish is causing trouble for Goldie's magnum opus, Detective Baby Shark must catch the culprit. // When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up to stop them on live TV.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Shark Prank - Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master... Grandma Shark.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Paddington and the Big Decision / Paddington's Beach Stowaway - On the last day of the school holidays Jonathan & Judy can't agree on what to do so Paddington has the casting vote. // The Browns come back from a beach trip with more than sand in their hair - why is that shell moving on its own?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Paddington and the Caterpillar / The Floor is Lava - Paddington has a new caterpillar friend, and he and Judy learn that not all changes are bad! // The Browns take part in a very competitive game of The Floor is Lava but who will win and will they make a good impression on an important visitor?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep225
programme.desc: George Catches a Cold - Peppa and George love jumping in puddles, even when it’s raining – but when George takes off his rain hat, he catches a cold. After a while George is feeling much better. Now he’s more than happy to wear his rain hat, even when it’s not raining.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep226
programme.desc: The Eye Test - Pedro Pony wears glasses. Peppa thinks she might need glasses too, so Mummy Pig takes her to the optician. Peppa is a little disappointed to discover that she has perfect vision – but that doesn’t stop her wearing some rather fabulous sunglasses.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep227
programme.desc: The Long Grass - The grass has grown so long that Peppa and George's ball gets lost. Grandpa arrives with his fantastic lawnmower and gets the grass cut in no time. Peppa and George find their plastic ball again and it bounces brilliantly on the short grass!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep228
programme.desc: Zoe Zebra, the Postman's Daughter - Mr. Zebra the Postman gets help from his daughter Zoë. Zoë has a very special letter for Peppa and George; an invitation to her birthday party. The party is fun, especially as it turns out that Zoë has invited all of Peppa and George’s friends.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep525
programme.desc: Escape from Volcano Island! - Skipper Molly and First Mate Gil are shipwrecked on Volcano Island, and it's about to erupt! But when parts of their boat start to mysteriously disappear, will they be able to make it off the island in time?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Spring is Here! - It's getting warmer outside, and the flowers are blooming - that must mean that spring is here! We play an outdoors game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to do on the first day of spring.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Blue Makes a Movie with YOU! - Josh and Blue are making a movie and they need YOUR help! We play Blue's Clues to figure out the ending of our movie- what will wake Magenta up after a magic flower makes her fall asleep? While looking for clues, we help Rapunzel make her own movie.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Pig Island - When Barbarito swipes the Windless Sail from Pig Island, the crew teams up their new pig friends to retrieve it.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Little Shrimp, Big Problems - The grand opening of Martín's paleta shop is almost ruined when a mysterious creature begins wreaking havoc in Merlandia.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Baby Tooth / Slobber Slug - When Baby Shark loses his tooth for real, he and William team up with an unexpected ally to track it down. // A game of Barnacle Ball turns into a rescue mission after Hank's pet rock, Rocky, is hit into the Lair of the Slobber Slug.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Tumminator - Bossy and Turtle have to face the scariest ride ever at Wacky Wacky World: The Tumminator!

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Turtle Tour - Turtle gives Gran-Gran a tour of his favorite amusement park.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Honey Bear - When Bossy's cousin Honey Bear comes to visit, he struggles to be a a good friend.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep89
programme.desc: Swap Places - The Teletubbies swap places in the Tubby Car and drive to the Hidey Hup. They swap places again on the Tubby Uppy Downy before going up and down.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S2 Ep14
programme.desc: Tree - Dee encourages a friend to say 'tree' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see a prickly tree, a tickly tree and even meet a friendly family of trees.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep73
programme.desc: Robo Po - When Logi-Po has trouble completing a task on his own, the rest of the team comes together remotely to help him.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep20
programme.desc: It's time to go on holiday - JoJo and Gran Gran are watering Cynthia's flowers while she's away on holiday. JoJo would like to go on holiday too, so JoJo and Gran Gran have a stay-at-home holiday in the park!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep32
programme.desc: Wild Thing - Monty and Jimmy Jones think it would be exciting to have a pet lion and wonder why you can't keep wild animals at home.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep31
programme.desc: Daydreamer Monty - Monty is dreaming up fantastical ways to get the new piano upstairs, but his family tell him that daydreaming won't help solve real problems.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep19
programme.desc: The Claw - When Bluey and Bingo are unable to grab a prize on a Magic Claw machine, Mum and Dad create their own version at home. But Dad isn't about to make winning easy.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep42
programme.desc: The Mythical Creature Badge - The Squirrels find a hidden book about mythical creatures. They learn and discover a wide range of mythical creatures, create their own and find out why the book was hidden in the first place.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep41
programme.desc: The Puzzle Badge - The Squirrels are close to finishing a jigsaw puzzle when the Naughty Mice steal their last piece!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep40
programme.desc: The Training Badge - Duggee struggles to organise the Squirrels in order of height and keeping them focused on the task. Sounds like the Squirrels need some training to improve their concentration.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep13
programme.desc: Cheddar Gorge, England - Glitch fills Cheddar Gorge with a river of melted cheese, turning it into a giant cheese fondue. Can the Go Jetters rescue the tourists and sheep from the cheesiest glitch ever?

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Monkey Bay, Thailand - Glitch's plans to open a hotel on an unspoilt beach in Thailand go horribly wrong when a group of macaque monkeys steal his Grim-o-freeze gun.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep18
programme.desc: The Doctor - Honey is stuck waiting for Dr Bingo's as the other injuries get seen before her. Receptionist Bluey tells her to be patient, some of these cases are a real pickle!

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Calypso - At school, Bluey and her friends enjoy various games. Teacher Calypso keeps her charges on track with a wise word and a song... all except the mysterious Pretzel.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animals S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Jumping - Andy Day looks at a selection of baby animals as they learn valuable jumping skills, from the springbok and the jerboa to the arctic fox.

programme.title: Andy's Secret Hideout S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Meerkats - There's meerkat madness in the hideout.

programme.title: My Pet and Me: Teeny Tiny Creatures S3 Ep14
programme.desc: Jellyfish - Chantelle visits an aquarium, whilst Rory meets a marine expert to look at jellyfish.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S2 Ep14
programme.desc: Plankety Plank - Children compete alongside adults in a special episode, with Tianna, Mia, dad Horace and teaching assistant Simon competing to win back Gem's jewels from pirates Cook, Line and Sinker.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep38
programme.desc: The Bridge Badge - It's bridge building time... the squirrels help a quarrelling group of Gerbils sort out their longstanding disagreement.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep37
programme.desc: The Buddy Badge - Duggee hosts a Buddy Bonanza for Mrs Weaver and the Squirrels, with the aim of finding new buddies with common interests to them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep36
programme.desc: The Diplomacy Badge - Betty and Sargent Ant just want perfection, but no one seems to be listening to their shouting! They need a lesson in diplomacy to learn how to speak in a more sensitive way.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep11
programme.desc: Himalayan Heroes, Nepal - Hoping to follow in his great-aunt's footsteps, Glitch enlists the help of a sceptical Foz and a friendly yak in order to find a yeti in the Himalayas.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Tulip Fields, Netherlands - Is Glitch stealing tulips from the Netherlands? That's what the Go Jetters think and they almost ruin the parade Glitch and Tala are making a huge tulip flower float for.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S15 Ep6
programme.desc: James to the Rescue - It is James' turn to be Sodor's rescue engine. At the Search and Rescue Centre, he eagerly awaits his 'call to action'.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep24
programme.desc: Cake Relocate - Cake is tired of living in the fridge, so Sarah & Duck help him think about where else he would like to stay.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep23
programme.desc: Extra Bounce - John's yellow bouncy ball is too bouncy, but Sarah thinks she knows where the solution can be found...

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep32
programme.desc: Rockpool Rescue - The sun is drying up the water so Nelly and Nora make a rockpool rescue.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep40
programme.desc: Dog Loves Stars - Pug wants to get closer to the stars, having looked at the night sky from the roof of the bookshop. On their travels they meet Granny Pug who takes them on her spaceship.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep30
programme.desc: The Queen - Monty wonders whether the Queen has perfect manners all the time, or whether even royalty slip up now and then.

programme.title: Dinopaws S1 Ep47
programme.desc: The Things That Went Somewhere - Bob, Gwen and Tony want to get into a shady place to escape the hot sun.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep72
programme.desc: Step Into The Light - Team Tinpo help a runner to see where he's going on his nightly run.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep71
programme.desc: Climbing The Walls and Ceilings - Can Team Tinpo help a rock climber reach new heights?

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep20
programme.desc: Tickle Crabs - When Dad brings a pair of tenacious tickle crabs home from the beach, nowhere in the house is safe! His only hope of escaping their tickles is with help from his true love.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep35
programme.desc: The Senses Badge - Roly has lost his best potato but Duggee finds it using his sense of smell. But what is a sense? Time for the Squirrels to learn about the five senses and earn their Senses Badge.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep34
programme.desc: The Comic Badge - Duggee is reading the Squirrels one of his favourite comics. They eagerly want to know the ending, but the comic was discontinued. Luckily Duggee has the comic badge!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep33
programme.desc: The Babysitting Badge - Duggee has a job to do outside of the Clubhouse. But who will look after the Squirrels? King Tiger of course, he has his Babysitting Badge. But then the Squirrels end up babysitting King Tiger!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Go Jetter Heroes: Amelia Earhart - Inspired by her hero Amelia Earhart, Xuli attempts a solo flight across the Atlantic Ocean in a vintage plane.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Solar Race: Australia - Glitch's hopes of winning a solar-powered race across the Australian outback are foiled when he crashes the Glitchster in the middle of the night.

programme.title: The Numtums S1 Ep44
programme.desc: The Great Numpup Rally - The Numpups are very excited as it is the day of the Great Gumnut rally, but Humpty Do isn't very good at competitions if only Super Numtum could help?

programme.title: Semua Tentang Kita - Malaysia Madani Khas #2 (Rpt)

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 33 - Costa Georgiadis looks at reducing urban heat with trees, Sophie Thomson explores a glorious fig farm, Jerry Coleby-Williams has a compost method for every type of organic waste and Tino Carnevale visits seed saving experts.

programme.title: Mystery Road: Origin Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Jay struggles with findings about Jack's death. He looks for clues pointing to foul play and he fights with Geraldine about how best to commemorate his father. Anousha searches for people involved with Josh's case.

programme.title: Compass - Indira's Tree Ep22
programme.desc: Sr. 36 - When broadcaster Indira Naidoo's sister suicided, Indira sought solace in her daily walks. Through nature's cycle of renewal - and with the help of some key people, she found her own ways to keep living.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep27
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Join Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep124
programme.desc: The daily destination for #auspol addicts. Greg Jennett comes to you from Parliament House with the latest news in politics and national affairs, plus interviews with key players on the issues and events making headlines.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep144
programme.desc: Casey Briggs brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events with the latest breaking news, the best coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to get you up to speed on what you need to know.

programme.title: The Drum Ep129
programme.desc: Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's daily lives, encouraging thoughtful, challenging debate with a diverse panel led by Ellen Fanning, Dan Bourchier, Julia Baird and John Barron.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep144
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Casey Briggs.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep112
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep144
programme.desc: More news, more often: the home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the issues that matter. The ABC's network of reporters uncover important stories and bring you news and information you need. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: The Business Ep100
programme.desc: Australia's leading daily business and finance show brings you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, investors, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Alicia Barry.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep144
programme.desc: Stay in touch with the latest breaking news and comprehensive coverage of the day's top stories. With reporters in more places, ABC News connects communities and tells the stories that matter to you. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: Back Roads - Strzelecki Track, SA (Part 1) Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 9 - Back Roads returns with a journey on the Strzelecki Track, starting near Lyndhurst in SA and heading into the Strzelecki Desert. Heather Ewart witnesses a way of life on this historic track that's been unchanged for decades.

programme.title: The World Ep144
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Beverley O'Connor presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's Vietnam Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Seafood is the main ingredient as we float around one of the world's natural wonders, Halong Bay. Blue swimmer crab and mussels are caught and cooked in and amongst the stunning floating villages and fisheries.

programme.title: Food Safari Earth - Winter Ep13
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Maeve O'Meara celebrates the surprisingly abundant produce of Winter across the most heart-warming recipes from around the world with Helina Lee, Jose Silva, Bente Grysbaek and Ross Lusted.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep112
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep145
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Miriam Corowa brings you today's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 33 - Costa Georgiadis makes a solar dehydrator for fruit and veg, Sophie Thomson meets a chef and a gardener working together, Clarence starts his autumn planting and Josh visits two couples sharing their house block and gardens.

programme.title: The China Century - Chinese Dreams Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Chinese President Xi Jinping understands the greatest threat to the authoritarian state is not an invading army but the free minds of its people. This episode explores the fight for freedom of thought in China.

programme.title: Food Safari Earth - Winter Ep13
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Maeve O'Meara celebrates the surprisingly abundant produce of Winter across the most heart-warming recipes from around the world with Helina Lee, Jose Silva, Bente Grysbaek and Ross Lusted.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's Vietnam Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Seafood is the main ingredient as we float around one of the world's natural wonders, Halong Bay. Blue swimmer crab and mussels are caught and cooked in and amongst the stunning floating villages and fisheries.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep125
programme.desc: Matthew Doran brings you all the very latest news and interviews on what's going on in the halls of Parliament House in Canberra and the topics and events making headlines from coast to coast in politics and national affairs.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep145
programme.desc: Casey Briggs brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events with the latest breaking news, the best coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to get you up to speed on what you need to know.

programme.title: The Drum Ep130
programme.desc: Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's daily lives, encouraging thoughtful, challenging debate with a diverse panel led by Ellen Fanning, Dan Bourchier, Julia Baird and John Barron.

programme.title: ABC News Ep202
programme.desc: News from where you live. ABC News Victoria brings you the day's top stories, exclusive investigations and original reporting on the issues that matter to you. Presented by Tamara Oudyn (Sun-Thu) and Mary Gearin (Fri-Sat).

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 19 - Essendon v Western Bulldogs Ep107
programme.desc: Essendon take on the Western Bulldogs at Marvel Stadium to start Round 19. The Bombers and Bulldogs both need to keep winning to improve their spot in the top 8, as 12 sides fight for a place in the finals in a tight season.

programme.title: The World Ep145
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: Escape From The City - Gold Coast Hinterland QLD: The Kennedys Ep38
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Property advisor Bryce Holdaway accompanies Sydney couple Kym and Cameron as they inspect real estate in the Gold Coast Hinterland.

programme.title: Australia Remastered: Forces of Nature - Flood Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Australian droughts are often followed by flood, a rhythm of life that the country has adapted to. While the inland is still subjected to natural floods, elsewhere the flood regimes are changing. (Final)

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep145
programme.desc: Know the latest on the day's top stories, as Michael Tetlow brings you a comprehensive roundup of the news of the day. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Close Of Business Ep25
programme.desc: There's never been a more important to keep an eye on your money. With a cost-of-living crisis, inflation and 12 interest rate rises plus global economic headwinds, Rachel Pupazzoni looks at the week in business and finance.

programme.title: The World Ep145
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep27
programme.desc: Beverley O'Connor brings you a snapshot of the week's international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Asia.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep145
programme.desc: Know the latest on the day's top stories, as Michael Tetlow brings you a comprehensive roundup of the news of the day. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: One Plus One - The Elders - Rodney Gibbins Ep7
programme.desc: Palawa man Rodney Gibbins shares what it was like to grow up being told a myth his people were dying out. From Lutruwita Rodney explains how the community fought to repatriate his peoples' remains, and the personal impact.

programme.title: Language and Me
programme.desc: A look at the role language plays for Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander people, highlighting the work done by language custodians to preserve this important aspect of our cultural and social lives. Hosted by Jack Evans.

programme.title: The Drum Ep130
programme.desc: Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's daily lives, encouraging thoughtful, challenging debate with a diverse panel led by Ellen Fanning, Dan Bourchier, Julia Baird and John Barron.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 33 - Costa Georgiadis makes a solar dehydrator for fruit and veg, Sophie Thomson meets a chef and a gardener working together, Clarence starts his autumn planting and Josh visits two couples sharing their house block and gardens.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep27
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Join Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch Ep24
programme.desc: Join Michael Rowland, Lisa Millar, Tony Armstrong, Madeleine Morris and Nate Byrne for some of the best conversations as we hear from some of the most informed and entertaining guests who have appeared on News Breakfast.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast: Early Ep29
programme.desc: Start your weekend informed and up-to-date. Fauziah Ibrahim and Kathryn Robinson bring you the latest news, interviews, politics, culture, weather and global affairs. Plus sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: ABC News Ep58
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch throughout the day with ABC News. We bring you the headlines and latest on the day's top stories, plus breaking news and live reports from the scene as events unfold.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep27
programme.desc: Beverley O'Connor brings you a snapshot of the week's international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Asia.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep58
programme.desc: Miriam Corowa presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep25
programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep27
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Join Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 19 - Richmond v Hawthorn Ep108
programme.desc: Traditional Saturday afternoon football at the MCG as two big inner city clubs the Richmond Tigers and Hawthorn Hawks clash in Round 19. The Tigers under interim coach Andrew McQualter are making a run towards the finals.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 19 - Brisbane Lions v Geelong Ep109
programme.desc: Geelong ended the Brisbane Lions season in 2022 with a Preliminary Final win on the Cats' way to the Premiership. Lions fans will be out in force at the Gabba as the 3rd placed Lions look to derail the Cats run to the Finals.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 19 - Port Adelaide v Collingwood Ep110
programme.desc: A mouth-watering top of the table clash, five weeks before the finals. Both teams have won 14 out of their first 16 games, with Port Adelaide winning a club record 13 straight games while Collingwood sit on top of the ladder.

programme.title: Australia Remastered: Wild Australians - Kangaroo Tales Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - The red kangaroo is iconic, but as Aaron Pedersen explains there is more to the kangaroo family than just one famous face. Explore how these marsupials spread across the continent, taking on a variety of shapes and forms.

programme.title: Four Corners Ep25
programme.desc: The longest running show on Australian TV, this award-winning current affairs documentary series is a powerhouse of investigative journalism - fearless and forensic, holding power to account through six decades and counting.

programme.title: Media Watch Ep24
programme.desc: Everybody loves it until they're on it! Australia's leading forum for media analysis and comment, bringing you a fearless critique of the week's journalism, issues and events in the news. Presented by Paul Barry.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep58
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters Ep11
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - The Fire Crew's season rests on a knife-edge as they struggle to battle their way back from a disastrous setback and end up finding a record-breaking opal haul.

programme.title: Fukushima Time-Lapse 5Min.
programme.desc: 10 years on from the 2011 tsunami and nuclear disaster, time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke seeks out the undiminished beauty of Fukushima. This time we focus on the star-filled night sky.

programme.title: Japan From Above: Up Close
programme.desc: This program takes you on an aerial journey across 21st century Japan. Enjoy the bird's-eye view of unique landscapes as well as intimate portraits of the people who inhabit the archipelago.

programme.title: Grand Sumo Highlights
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from July 20, Day 12 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Nagoya.

programme.title: Sumopedia
programme.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Newsline In Depth
programme.desc: Introducing a colorful variety of feature stories, including reports on daily life from locations throughout Japan, as well as other parts of Asia and around the world.

programme.title: Asia Insight
programme.desc: In Nepal's Himalayan region known as "Little Japan," the number of workers moving to Japan has caused depopulation, and women left in the village must raise grandchildren while performing farm work.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Silvia Polleri, founder of the world's first restaurant inside a prison, brings customers to this unusual location for a delicious meal, setting the stage for social change both in and out of prison.

programme.title: Bento Expo
programme.desc: Maki makes a Miso-mayo Sawara (Spanish mackerel) Bento. Marc makes a Beef & Spicy Mayo Roll Bento. From The Philippines, bento boxes that combine cute characters and traditional flavors.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: Watchmaker Ito Naofumi is also a rather unusual artist. Using old watch parts, his lifelike creations express a watchmaker's appreciation for the eternal beauty found inside a timepiece.
